REVIEWThe three joint nutrients work together to improve joint health.  I have a lot of pain in my hip and leg joints.  It already seems that the vitamin is working.The glucosamine sulfate is bound to potassium chloride to improve stability and has a ratio of 5:4 along with the chondroitin sulfate.  It has the purest for of MSM, OptiMSM which is a naturally occurring sulphur compound which helps the glucosamine and chondroitin.The dosage that is suggested on the bottle is 2 caps twice daily.  Just starting out it might be good to vary the amount to see what is best for you. We have to keep our joints in good health.  They are a big part of our body and getting around in life. I was given a complimentary bottle of Viva Labs Glucosamine Chondroitin MSM Combination for my view of the product

REVIEWHow many of us have been hurt while in love?  This is a good story of opening oneself up after being hurt.  Since the death of his wife, Leif has withdrawn and become a total loner.  He puts himself into his work to avoid the pain.  himself in work instead.  A town history mural is to be painted in Heartlandia by Marta.  After being with a man for five years, they broke up because he wasn't interested in being a daddy.  She plans to concentrate on her baby and her art.  Nothing to do with any guy.I felt so bad for Leif that he has all this pain being such a good man.  I imagine there are a lot of readers out there that feel that pain of loosing someone they love through death. Leif is paying for the town's mural and the artist is ggoing to live in his home.  He didn't have any idea she was going to be stunningly beautiful and he found himself attracted to her.Once he finds out about her pregnancy, the protective side of him comes out.She was attracted to Leif but just couldn't fall in love and go through what she went through before.  It just hurts too much.  She finally saw past the loner and saw the loving, caring man inside that hurt exterior.  Leif gradually realizes he like Marta's company in his home.  Does Leif want Marta like he wanted his wife?  Could Leif let go of the hurt and the loneliness?  Could the two of them let go of the past and find a future together?  The author gave the reader a lot of emotions to fit in and go through with the characters.  A lot of it feels so real since so many of us have gone through or are going through what Leif and Marta have.The ending was sort of a surprise and I really enjoyed it.  It was about the pirate trunks and how they effected the town.  Everyone deals with things in a different way.I was given a complimentary copy of Falling-for the Mom-To-Be from the author, Lynne Marshall for my view of the book.

REVIEWThe retractable Dog Leash is 16 ft in length.  For dogs up to 40-50 pounds.  When you use this product  you can't put the cable clamp near your head or face  In order to avoid the cable of bracket being damage, do not tug the leash while attached to your pet.  To prevent cuts burns or even other problems, do not let the rope or webbing wrap around your body or fingers.  Do not try to disassemble this product.  It has a pre-wound spring that may cause injury when opening.The handle is ergonomically designed and fits fine since I have a small hand.  My dog learned very fast to walk right beside me on his own.  To put the leash in a lock position is really easy, just press down on the black button and press towards the handle to keep it locked.  The sound it made when it retracted was rather loud and my dog was a little spooked from it.  All in all this one of the best retractable dog leashes I have seen.  I've had several that after a couple walks with the dog they wouldn't retract any more.  This one seems to be durable and quality made. I was given a complimentary Retractable Dog Leash from Rosy and Rocky Pet Supply Co. for my view of the product.

REVIEWThe wig is cute and price worthy.  I got it so my niece could play dress up.  She wanted to show all her friends.  The wig is very soft.  The photo on Amazon shows the color to be true and it is pretty up close.  Most of the costume wigs are real shiny but this wig had a matte finish.  There was a problem with the front of the wig.  There were no adjustable straps, so it kept slipping down.  I would like it better if the hair was a little thicker at the crown.  It is rather thin.  My niece loves it.  All her friends want to wear it.  It would also be good for a costume party or Halloween.I received this complimentary wig from Rbenxia for my view of the wig.

reviewA dangerous gunman is holding Dr. Mark Baker and Nurse Kelly Atkinson.  Everyone in the emergency room could possibly die.  By nightfall, three men are dead.  Mark had tried to save the police officer who died but he failed.  The other two dead men were members of the Zeta drug cartel.  Killing is not over despite the standoff is,  Drug Cartels hold grudges and don't forget.  When one of their members die, revenge is in the waiting.  Through all of this, Mark is under suspicion as a killer and yet he is still a potential victim.  He looks to his high school sweetheart, Gwen Woodruff but she is trying to hide her own feelings for the doctor.  The author gives the reader three questions to find answers to.  So as you turn those pages, try to find the answers.  1. Who is the shooter? 2.  Who will the next victim be?  3.  Can Mark prove himself innocent before the gun is in his face.?  The book is very well written and gives some interaction as to how drug cartels respond when death faces their group.  Will there be romance for Gwen and Mark?  That is if Mark survives and the real gunman is found.  I would recommend this book to everyone.  It's a good murder mystery for anyone who loves that type of genre. You won't get bored because the suspense will keep you on the edge of your chair until the end.  When you get to the end, you'll want more.I was given a complimentary copy of FATAL TRAUMA from the author Richard L. Mabry and Litfuse Bloggers for my view of the book.

REVIEWI fell in love with this organic cacao powder.  The texture gives you a silky smoothie. You can add a few extras like honey, nuts,seeds and your powder to make a yummy chocolate candy to die for. Quick and easy. Cacao is high in magnesium, a little iron and a source of potassium.I was glad it came in a bag rather than a tub. Much easier and the price is perfect for the amount you get.The product is non-GMO, organic, vegan and gluten free.  It is a Product of Peru.I was given a complimentary 1 pound bag of Organic Cacao  Powder from Viva Labs for my view of the product.

REVIEWI didn't have the faintest idea what MCT oil is.  I did a little research and MCT stands for medium chain triglycerides.  Medium chain fatty acids have a tremendous health benefit and are in coconut oil and goat's milk.  Coconut oil is natural while MCT is produced.  The oil is made into ketones, that are used as fuel for your brain.  It also helps burn fat,  control your cholesterol levels and helps with immunity and absorption of nutrients.It is odorless and tasteless and unlike coconut oil, it remains a liquid.  The very main reason for MCT oil is weight loss and gaining of energy.  It is a supplement.  You can add like a tablespoon to your coffee, smoothie, you can use the oil added with vinegar as a salad dressing.  SUGGESTION:  begin with 1 tablespoon a day until you know how it will affect you.I received a complimentary 32 ounce bottle of MCT Oil from Viva Labs for my view of the product.

REVIEWEverybody has heard about Chia seeds.  These Chia seeds are great.  They have numerous health benefits.  Chia seeds can be eaten raw in salads.  It can be added to smoothies, puddings, baked goods and it seems to go into everything. I saw this on another review and I thought what a great idea.INGREDIENTS: 1 tablespoon chia seeds, 3 tablespoons water(cold)METHOD  In a small bowl, mix the chia seeds with the water. Let set for 10-15 minutes, until it is gel like.Replaces 1 egg, makes about 1/4 cupThis product is certified organic with no GMO's.I was given a 1 pound bag of Organic Chia Seeds frorm Viva Labs for my view of the product.

REVIEWI love chocolate and have never tried the Cacao Nibs.  I thought maybe they would help me cut down on eating my chocolate.  The Nibs have a dark chocolate flavor and very healthy.  They are a source of vitamins, minerals, fiber, protein and antioxidants.  They're not milk chocolate flavor but almost a bitter dark chocolate flavor.They are unsweetened and all natural.  I was just a bit disappointed because I do like my milk chocolate, like Hershey bars. It's good to try something different so I just decided to snack on a few.  They're not bad but I only snack on about 4.  My friend told me to throw some in a grinder to make a powder for smoothies.  That was a good idea.  They have 130 calories per 1-oz with 14 grams of fat, 8 grams of carbs with 6 grams of dietary fiber.  That leaves only 2 net carbsI was given a complimentary 1 pound bag of Organic Cacao Nibs from Viva Labs for my view of the product.

REVIEWI've never tried goji berries before.  They are a large berry, plump, juicy, soften when you put them in your mouth.  They're rather chewy which I like and their taste is good.  They are both sweet and tart at the same time, kind of like some of the candies the kids like. I like to mix them with different nuts and seeds and put in an air tight container.  When I go on a small outing or picnic, I put some in a zip lock bag to munch on.  Kind of like a trail mix.  I see where some of the customers add it to their smoothies. I will have to try that.  I put some in some beef stew and believe it or not, it was good. I'm glad I got this sample to try. Go! Goji Berries!I received a complimentary 1 pound bag of ORGANIC GOJI BERRIES from Viva Labs for my view of the product.

REVIEW If you enjoy an interesting Christmas story, this book would be great for you and your children.  This book isn't your normal children's book with a hard cover and 30 pages.  It is paperback and 198 wonderful pages.  A Chapter book, no less. I found it rather cute that the story was told from the sweater  herself, her name Sophie.  It's rather strange but I found myself relating  and getting to know the sweater in all kinds of ways.  Sophie writes down her daily events since so much happened in December.  She is separated from her family, gets to be a model and is looked at a lot.  Even though Sophie goes through a lot of disappointments, she struggles and learns to  get through it all with the  help of her  "family".  She finds ways to stay happy.  The author wrote a heart warming novel that is meant for little ones, tweens, YA and those not so young at heart.  There are a lot of lessons to learn from this novel.  There are a lot of emotions in this book too that everyone can relate to. If you're having a bad day and are down, if you are worried about something then this book should be on your shelf so you can go pick it up and do a little reading.  You will feel better.You can't help but love Sophie. I was given a complimentary copy of DIARY OF AN UGLY SWEATER from the author Cassi Eubank for my view of the book.

REVIEW This book is the third in the series of six.  The author's series Journey of the Heart has been releasing each month since March.  The books are short and easy to read.  When you finish the book, you can't wait to get to the next book.  If you are short on time, these books are great.  Doesn't take long to read and still get your work done. One of the characters that made me wonder was Ben Croftner.  It seems like he gets away with anything he does, evil and wrong.  He never gets deserved punishment.  Rand has a relationship with Sarah and I would get so upset with Rand.  The author wrote this story as though it were real life.  I love books like that since you can really get into the book, like you are actually part of the story.  I haven't read the first two books but intend to so I can follow the continuation of the story.  The next book is out in May, A Heart's Betrayal.I was given a complimentary copy of A HEART"S DANGER from the author, Colleen Coble and BookLook Bloggers for my view of the book.

REVIEWNUTRITION FACTS:Serving Size 1/4 cup (46g) dry mixServings Per Container: 10Calories: 165Total Fat: 3g Saturated Fat 0g Trans Fat 0gCholesterol: 0mgSodium: 2mgTotal Carbs: 30g Dietary Fiber: 3g Sugars: 0gProtein: 6gQuinoa can be fancied up in many ways and yet in all natural organic ways.  You can purchase it ready to go, but that kind is not organic with a ton of ingredients.  The Viva Lab's Quinoa list is very short. It has the labels which are nice so you can read it each time before you prepare it. The product is Non GMO and USDA Organic verified.  This product comes from Bolivia.  Quinoa has good protein content,  at 6 g per serving, that's quite good.  A good way to get that extra protein in your diet.  It is quick and very easy (about 15 minutes) to prepare. It's good with vegetables.  Try different things to add to your Quinoa.  You may come up with a recipe you can't do without.Viva Lab's Quinoa is pre washed but I would suggest rinsing again.  It's gluten free with a nice dose of protein.  A wonderful additive for that extra protein.I received a complimentary sample of ORGANIC QUINOA WHOLE GRAIN< NON GMO  One Pound Bag from Viva Labs for my view of  the product.

REVIEWI'm not actually concerned about weight loss but I did find that after a couple of days I had a little more energy and less appetite. There are other similar brands of Caralluma on the market but this one is more economical. Saving money is always a plus if the product is as good or better. Caralluma Fimbriata is traditionally known cacti that has reached modern awareness.  In other areas, Caralluma is used to suppress hunger and ease thirst while game tacking.  This increases endurance. Taking the pills is much easier and convenient than taking a piece off, peeling and chewing.  Most people, two capsules, 1000 mg a day has no side effects.  If you have a sensitive GI tract, there may be stomach upset, gas, constipation and stomach pain which usually disappears in a  week of usage.  If you're looking for an appetite suppressant try out this product, B-Nergetics Caralluma.I was given a complimentary sample of CARALLUMA from the maker B-Nergetics for my view of the product.

REVIEW If you're like me you will love another gadget. This one is a This one is a garlic press for Mincing, dicing, grating and as  GARLIC CHOPPER.  When this was designed , everything was researched and put into the design.  Two blades, one for cube sized slices and the other slices.  A nice feature is the extra blade stores underneath the device, keeping it handy and yet out of the way. This way you will never misplace the GARLIC CHOPPER blade.  The lid is also a garlic pusher into which a little box holds the choppings.  The little box slides in and out easily. It's made so that it doesn't slide out and get misplaced.  If you like easy and we all do, this little GARLIC CHOPPER press is a way to keep things easy, instead of the old way of mincing and using the cutting board as a GARLIC CHOPPER.  Everyone should have one of these little gadgets in their kitchen.  Easy, durable and versatile.I was given a complimentary GARLIC CHOPPER, press, mincer,slicer, dicer and grater from Perfect Life Ideas for my view of  the product.

REVIEWThis basic aluminum wallet is sleek and very compact.  It looks very nice.  It appears to be well made.  Inside there is a 6 slot accordion pocket which will hold 6 credit cards.  The cards are easy to put in and take out.  The pockets seem to be attached very well and I think they will last quite a long time.  It has a snap that keeps it shut tight so it won't snap open unless you do so.The latch is a little hard to work, a little uncomfortable to open.  It has to be pressed quite firmly.  It takes up far less room than a regular wallet.The wallet does not block RD signals such as those used in RFID.  They are blocked by metal (such as aluminum).  This is from using an electromagnetic device known as a Faraday Cage.  This metal, aluminum, creates an area which does not allow RF waves to read the RFID cards.  A nice little aluminum wallet -RFID blocking for your credit cards.I received a complimentary sample of Kinzd ultra thin aluminum  metal wallet -RFID blocking from Kinzd  for my view of the product.

REVIEWI'm in my sixties and my skin needs a little extra pampering.Joyal Beauty products  save time and yet all the benefits that are necessary for the skin's daily health are still being received.The pump bottle makes it so much easier to use that trying to count the drops from a screw top bottle, which is a waste cause you always squeeze out too much. Joyal Vitamin C serum incorporates the Hyaluronic Acid which saves another step in your skin routine.  The last step i applying the Joyal Skin Renewal Serum.  Using Vitamin C from Joyal with the Renewal serum covers the routine skin treatment. Joyal Vitamin C serum also contains MSM, which is a facial softener, and other moisturizing elements such as Aloe, Kosher Vegetable Glycerin, and Jojoba Oil, and Joyal Renewal Serum contains all the antioxidants, anti-inflammatory and astringent properties - skin repair properties, including Royal Jelly and Honey. The serums immediately absorb into my skin, without any oily or greasy residue, leaving my facial skin soft and hydrated. I can instantly apply my sunscreen and cosmetic makeup, thereby saving me a substantial amount of time, while still meeting all my skin-care requirements.Some people will see some changes in 2-4 weeks, it may take longer for others.Another wonderful product from Joyal.  They are also a wonderful company to work with.I received a sample  of Joyal Beauty The Best Organic Vitamin C Serum for my view of the product.

REVIEWThis product is 100% pure, natural and vegan.  No oils,chemicals, alcohols or parabens.  It is GMO and Cruelty free.  The preservative used is Organic and made from fermented radishes.If you have aging skin, it help promote tissue repair through increasing the skin's elasticity and supporting healthy collagen production.  This keeps skin plum and firm.For dry or flaky skin, this serum will help with a moisture barrier, lock in hydration and smooth the texture of skin.  Use it with wet skin.For oily or acneic skin, this serum also has antibacterial properties.  Contains no oil, it is not greasy,light enough to use everyday.  Keep the oily skin hydrated or it will produce more oil and sebum which cause more break outs.This bottle can in a 1 oz/30 ml spray bottle with a sealed cap.  Very convenient.I was given a complimentary sample of Joyal Beauty Vitamin C Serum for my view of the product.

REVIEWI'm in love with this bag.  It compares amazing to the high end bags.  The price for this bag is so much less than some bags you find in boutiques.  The quality is good.  It is made of soft and supple leather and the quilt stitching is very straight.  I like that there are two straps for the bag. One for like everyday and the chain one for a little more dress up.  The long leather strap can be  used as a cross body bag.  It is rather stiff, two compartments separated by a pocket with a zipper in the middle.  You could use this bag for almost any occasion. It's very versatile, well made and just enough room for your essentials.  It would go with work clothes, perhaps a suit, or a dressy dress for going out at night. Lovely bag.  Would love to have another one of a different color.I received a complimentary Avber Quilted Crossbody Handbag with two straps from Avber for my view of the product.

REVIEWHow would you feel if you had to live in a Christian community and share all your worldly possessions? The author, Linda Maendel shares a  small glimpse into the everyday work and faith of her people, the Hutterian Brethren.  Everyone worked together for the better of the whole.  The book has stories of coming together to bring in the fall potato crop, laughing out  loud stories when sisters have a romance. Ms. Maendel takes the readers into her colony, known as her Bruderhof.  It is on a prairie in western Canada.  Everyone works, eats, plays and worships together.  They use their talent to craft goods for a living.  This is an alternative to the everyday mainstream society.  A wonderfully written book that takes you into the life of people who are different to us in some ways and very much like us in others.  I would recommend this book to everyone.  It will being a calming affect to your heart.  The books about the Plainspoken series are:Book 1 Chasing the Amish Dream: My Life as a Young Amish Bachelor by Loren BeachyBook 2 Called to Be Amish: My Journey from Head Majorette to the Old Order by Marlene MillerBook 3 Hutterite Diaries: Wisdom from My Prairie Community by Linda MaendelI was given a complimentary copy of HUTTERITE DIARIES from the author, Linda Maendel and Litfuse Bloggers for my view of the book.

REVIEWFor protecting the money you paid for your Apple Watch, this is a good protector.  Most people don't like something heavy and bulky, I know I don't.  The product isn't bulky nor too thick.  The item is made of TPU material and will keep your Apple Watch from being scratched and nicked.It's not too thick that it will interfer with buttons nor so thin it would tear.  Since it is chrystal clear it doesn't interfer with reading the watch.  It fits nicely and the buttons on the side can be accessed easily. So far I have found that this is a nice little cover for the Apple Watch.  I received a complimentary sample of the Apple Watch Case from Lightning Knight for my view of the product.

REVIEW The author gave the reader so much in the fast paced, complicated read.  Chameleon was a true joy to read.  A little longer than what I normally like.  There was so much, woven webs, twists and turns, love, supernatural, good against evil and MORE!  WOW!  That's a lot to keep a reader stuck to the chair.  Never a dull moment.  To start with, it was Danielle/Dani's birthday and Russ, her best friend pulled off a prank.  This cause all the weirdness to come out.  The reader finds out the Russ isn't who he seems to be and neither is Dani.  This is where life becomes a thrill ride.  The story is quite complex and yet the author never lets you get lost.  You never have to re-read a few pages to get back on track.  The author added a love triangle to put in a little pizazz.  The author wrote a story where you get caught up with the character's lives.  It's almost like you are there with them.  Everything the author added to this interesting read made a perfect paced story.  I  would recommend this book to anyone.  It's a well written story with lots to keep your interest and your eyes on your book.I was given a complimentary copy of CHAMELEON from the author, Kelly Oram for my view of the book.

REVIEW Although this book is not the solution, it can help quite a bit to give direction to the newly assigned manager.  The ideas are very straightforward of which  maybe not totally understood, can be learned.  To totally understand the ideas, they must be applied.  There is never a simple no substitute for experience.  This book is only a starter, a primer, it covers the basics, purpose and goals to the final details.  This book can help a lot to reduce the anxiety of facing a promotion. The book is like a jump start and has some very good starting ideas.  By no means is this book a total solution. As said before.  There is no substitute for experience.  Use the book as an aide for ideas to apply for that new promotion that may be coming up. I received a complimentary copy of PROJECT MANAGEMENT from the author Kalpesh Asher for my view of the book.

REVIEW Any little one is always trying to reach things that they are too little to reach, light switches, shelves and counter tops.  When they can't reach them, they try using their toys to stand on.  Usually this ends in a crying little one.  They could fall and get hurt.  Usually what they try to stand on is very unstable.  I feel that the iHomeSet mini small folding stepping stool can be a safe way for the little ones to carry around (there is a handle that folds down) and use when they can't reach something.  It is a good, safe way for children to reach the sink to wash and brush their teeth.  This stool is even strong enough for adults.  A nice part of the stool is that it's design folds which makes it easy to store wherever such as closets, under the bed, in the care or just in a corner.  The built in handles makes it easy for little ones to carry around and the non skid top keeps them from slipping off the stool.  Small but handy. I received a complimentary Strong and Stable Folding Step Stool with Non-Skid Top from iHomeset for my review of the product.

REVIEW When I read the title I immediately thought of Alice in Wonderland.  I thought this is going to be a good fantasy read.  It is alike in some ways.  There is a big secret that is hidden by the boys and girls that live in separate orphanages. This is a huge secret.  Then Kitty comes into the picture and she's pretty smart.  She got to be friends with some of the girls and learns how the secret came to them and why they held on to it.  This is definitely a different read. The author wrote at a fast pace and those pages are turning as fast as the reader can.  The author is definitely a good writer and very talented.  I would recommend this book to anyone who loves fantasy, especially a twist on fantasy.  This will be put on my shelf to be read again.Looking forward to her next book.  If it's as good as this one, it's a winner.I was given a complimentary copy of DOWN THE WORMHOLE from the author, Ana Franco for my view of the book.

REVIEWThe author, John Spencer Yantiss wrote a wonderful, old fashioned detective murder mystery. Two life changing events, only to be done away with, were an all natural childbirth over two decades ago, the other three were murders and one was an attempted slaying.  The book is intriguing and  interesting. The beginning is  Eleanor Harkness visiting detectiveSherrod Reynard Colsne and his confidant, Montague Boyd 'Monty' Weston.  They lived in the New York City, "Granite Palace".  They meet to discuss finding her father's killer.The book spans many years and continents over just 4 days.  Monty writes from his point of view.  During the story other murders take place and the true mystery is who the true killer is.  The author allows the reader to be there as there are detailed sights and sounds of New York, Europe and India.  The author apparently did a lot of research and travel to give the reader his believable story withcharacters you feel you know.If you are a murder/mystery lover, I would recommend this to anyone who loves fine story lines that end up wrapped up in a consistent manner. I received a complimentary copy of MURDER BY BEQUEST from the author, John Spencer Yantiss for my view of the book.

REVIEW As soon as I started reading this book, I was hooked.  I don't believe I've read anything like it before. The author gave the characters such personalities and they fit in the story as though original and real.  The book isn't just words but a visual picture of the story which is very different than most authors. The book kept me interested all the way through the pages until the end. The author gave the reader plenty of woven webs, twists and turns and a lot of events that kept the book exciting.  I would recommend this book to any reader.  The book is interesting, well written, exciting and keeps your mind intrigued on the book. I received a complimentary copy of NIGHT OF THE FAE from the author, Lyneal Jenkins for my view of the book.

REVIEW This book, Macabre 2 is two very short stories centered around detective Sherrod Reynard (which means fox in French) Colsne and his side kick Monty Weston. Mr. Yantiss uses these names as they make the reader recall Sherlock Holmes and John Watson. The first story is about a strange weerwolf  (Dutch spelling)and the second story is about a mysterious series of human and animal deaths.  These are set in today's world.  Living in a large Manhattan brownstone, Colsne and Weston seem to be bachelors, wealthy and have associations with the New York society's upper crust. All the characters are as if they were living in 1880.  Neither mystery is the same.  The Weerwolf is obviously a supernatural story while the other is more of a standard mystery. The book was an OK read but I don't think I would read it again.  I think the reason why is that they were too short for the reader to really get their thoughts into it.I was given a complimentary copy of MACABRE 2 from the author, John Spencer Yantiss for my view of the book.

REVIEWThis story was written after the novel MURDER BY BEQUEST whichh was Book 1 but happened before the first book. Setting 2003, Florida.  Colsne received a message from his friend Sir Guy Hugo de May, Marquis of Maubrey. Sir guy and his associates became a little leary when they came down with gastroenteritis.  This happened while working on a top secret communications and tracking system. That same day Colsne and Monty, his side kick were to leave.  In Florida Monty was drugged, saved by a doctor and a murder took place.  This book is written in first person by Monty who resided in the "granite Palace" in New York City. This characters are top class such as butlers and all the servants that upper class citizens have.  The author did a good job of writing this short mystery.  The reader will find himself asking if they knew who the perpetrator is,As the end nears we still don't know who drugged Monty.  We know who brought him the coffee, but was it him or the murderer?  The books don't need to be read in order.  The author wrote a wonderful mystery that leaves the reader wondering and trying to figure out who the murderer is and who drugged Monty.  Can  you figure it out?I received a complimentary copy of CODE NAME: ERELIM from the author John Spencer Yantiss for my view of the book..

REVIEWTo me Amish books are always heart warming.  Ms. Gray always write charming and lovely books.  It grabs your heart and holds on.The second book, The Proposal at Siesta Kay takes you away to Pinecraft, Florida.  She is going against her parent's wishes and off she goes. Penny's parents have done everything possible to keep her safe at home in Pinecraft since her older sister was raped, beaten and left in a cornfield in Ohio.  Even though it's against the family's wishes, Penny goes to hear a missionary group where the Knoxx Family is speaking.  The main speaker is Michael Knoxx and Penny and Michael continue to run into each other after Penny gets a job at the Orange Blossom Inn, where Michael is recuperating from surgery. Their relationship continues to grow but Michael will be leaving soon.  Will backward, shy Penny go with Michael?The author gives such detail that you feel like you are in Florida eating a delicious banana nut muffin from the Orange Blossom Inn. From page  one you are turning the pages with such attachment that you can't wait for the next book to come out. A wonderful read.I was given a complimentary copy  of THE PROPOSAL OF SIESTA KEY from the author, Shelly Shepherd Gray and Litfuse publicity for my view of the book.

I have been using this moisturizing Plasma Cream from MediDerm for about a week now along with the Caviar Serum. I love how how silky smooth this creme leaves my skin super silky smooth after use.This creme comes in a wide mouth 1.7oz goegeous jar. The jar is classy and elegant and looks amazing sitting along my vanity. When you open it, it is literally filled to the brim, which is something I love seeing as other similar products do not completely fill their jars. The cream  is very thick, but not heavy if that makes any since. A tiny bit goes a long ways so don't waste this by using too much. When I apply it it spreads easily and evenly on to my skin and absorbs quickly. I love that there is not a heavy greasy feeling or sticky residue left behind. My skin is left looking and felling supple and well hydrated through out the day.The only thing I do not like about this cream is the fragrance. Fragrance annoys me in general, but often irritates my skin and eyes as well. Luckily I have not had any irritation from the fragrance, but would love to see them eliminate it to keep it more natural.Promotional product pricing received for the purpose of inspection and unbiased review.

I'm going to be 35 in a couple of months, So I have become slightly addicted to making sure I take extra special care of my face. When I had the opportunity to try MediDerms Extrait de Caviar Luxury Cellular Firming Concentrate I jumped in. I was super excited to try a product that contains caviar, as to me it says luxury, class, top of the line.What I like about this face serum is that it is an actual serum, not gel or cream. Just a tiny bit goes a long way which will make this 1oz bottle last for a really long time. The serum is light and silky but effective, not heavy and greasy like others I have used in the past. It absorbs quickly and does not irritate my skin.I gave this serum 4 stars instead of 5 for two reasons. Once applied and absorbed it felt like I had a slightly sticky residue left before applying the Hydra Cream I received to use along with the caviar serum. The stickiness does go away after using the cream, but if used with out the cream I wouldn't be happy with that feeling. Also it has fragrance. I don't typically care for fragrance in my face products as it can be at times irritating to skin and eyes.I do like this Cavier serum when used with the Plasma Hydra cream and it seems to be working well in keeping my skin looking youthful and glowing. Also, it only takes about half a pump of product to cover the entire face so it's going to last a long time.Promotional product pricing received for the purpose of inspection and unbiased review.

These roasting forks are a huge upgrade from the flimsy sticks we used when I was a kid for sure! This 10pack of roasting forks is perfect for my family and then some. We often have neighbor kids over for BBQs and it has always been a challenge to find enough sticks for everybody. Now, we can roast 20 hotdogs, marshmallows or what ever else they come up with all at once . No more having to impatiently wait and take turns to make that ooey gooey smore.These roasting fork are a nice length of 3feet making it safer compared to a stick for children to roast their own. What I like most is since its metal the fork will not go up in flames until a dry stick would. It has a nice contoured plastic handle making it easy for anybody to grip. These roasting forks clean up super easy when done and have a loop at the end of the handle so you can hang them up out of the way. Definitely made of higher quality materials which means they will last a long time allowing you to roast many many smores, hotdogs or whatever  your heart desires.Promotional product pricing received for the purpose of inspection and review

If you have an athlete in your house then you know the rank stinch that lingers along with them on the ride home after a game in the dreaded gym bag. You also know that pretty smelling sprays just make matters worse.Well thank goodness this amazing all natural bamboo charcoal deodorizer bag has come into our lives, and my sons gym bag. Seriously, this thing is AMAZING! It is the first thing I have found all season long that neutralizes that putrid smell. the best part about this deodorizer bag is that is so easy to use. Just throw it  in Tue bag and go. Bye bye sweaty jock  b.o..The bamboo charcoal comes in its own linen bag. After about a month of use the directions say to recharge it for an hour or two in the sun. I haven't had to recharge it yet but sounds simple.  The linen bag seems very durable. My son just throws his gear in his bag after a game and so far it has held up to his abuse.Promotional product pricing received for the purpose of inspection and unbiased review.

I am no stranger when it comes to adult toys. I've owned many different shapes, sizes , ect. What I really like about the King Kong from Adams Gift is the shape size, variety of speed and pulses and material. Most toys I've had only met one or two of these.The King Kong is the ideal size. Most people assume bigger is better but for me that simply isn't true. I personally prefer "average" length and girth. The King Kong definitely meet a the average size standards and make s it perfect fit.The wave design is a first for me. But I have come to really like it. With the tip curving up, it makes it ideal for g-spot stimulation. Also the other waves through the shaft makes it a more comfortable and enjoyable fit  hitting all the ideal spots.I really like the silicone covering on this toy. Whether you use lubricant or not, it stays soft and smooth and never gets sticky making it easy to glide over your delicate areas.The power/selection button is located toward the base making it easy to access. Changing vibrations is as simple as a quick touch of the button. There are 7 variations to choose from making it easy to find one that suits you mood. I've come to have a love hate relationship with the button. I like that it is conveniently located and quick to go through the various modes. At the same time, it can be quite frustrating when in the heat of the moment you accidentally tap that button causing you to frantically cycle through to that pleasure speed.This toy requires 2AAA batteries which are not included with the purchase. Make sure to have some on hand for its arrival and for back up as you'll for sure need them.As you have read this toy has many many benefits and only one con. Its definitely worth adding to you collection. If you're a beginner this is a great introductory toy as it is ideal in size and simple to use.Promotional product pricing received for the purpose of inspection and unbiased review.

This has been great for my sensitive acne prone skin. I am literally thrilled with this face wash from perfect body harmony.This cleanser is thinner than I had anticipated. With that said just a pea sized amount cleanses my face completely with mixed with water. It lathers nicely and makes washing simple. It has a very natural herbal scent to it which reaffirms the natural organic statements. On thing I did notice is you really want to rinse well. One night after cleansing I was in a hurry and did not rinse well. It does leave skin dry and tight if not rinsed well.Since using this product the only breakouts I have suffered is due to monthly hormonal changes. If it could rid of those as well this would be the perfect cleanser for all!So to sum it up this cleanser works well and helps clear and prevent acne, only takes a small drop to effectively cleanse making it last a very long time, and is natural and gentle for sensitive skin. Basically, I love it!Promotional pricing provided for the purpose of inspection and review.

I take foot care very seriously. I think it has something to do with one of my childhood babysitters big nasty dried up crusty feet with thick long over grown toe nails wedged into the 80s rainbow flip flops while strutting around in her moo moo. That image is forever burned into my head and tops the list of most disturbing memories.A good foot cream is an essential item in any foot care routine. That's why I was excited to try this Dead Sea Mineral Foot Cream from LeliaSea. This foot cream tops the list of luxury foot creams. This Dead Sea Mineral foot care is very thick and creamy as a good foot cream should be. It is white in color and has a soft light scent that is not overwhelming at all.The foot cream goes a long way. Though its thick, just a pea sized amount moisturizes an entire foot. It glides on in to a silky smooth finish and absorbs quickly. Since it only takes just a pea size for each foot, this 1.7oz tube will last for a very long time even with daily use. This cream leaves my feet super silky soft. I love how soft they are after use with out that greasy residue left behind. Love this foot cream and will definitely order more once this tube runs out.Promotional product pricing received for the purpose of inspection and unbiased review.

These pigments have been sooooo much fun for my daughters. They love creating things and have been having a blast creating their own nail polish colors. These colors are so pigmented it only takes a little bit to create gorgeous nail polish colors. I am surprised at how far the baggies have gone actually. Even though the description doesn't sound like much you actually get quite a bit. The variety of colors is amazing as well. Having so many options gives them endless amount of fun. Our next craft project as soon as I get the materials is homemade soap to make for Christmas gifts. We have a large selection of molds, and cant wait to get creative with them. These pigments are absolutely worth the money!Promotional product pricing received for the purpose of inspection and review.

I love these food containers! Recently in an effort to save money for a down payment on a new home I have been cutting out all unnecessary expenses such as eating out  5 times a week for lunch. These 2 compartment food storage containers are perfect for for storing last nights left overs for todays lunch.These containers are both dishwasher and microwave safe. This is important because most of my meals require heating before consuming. So far I have heated everything from soup to spaghetti to chili in these containers and not once have I experienced the staining and melting bubbling plastic issue I have with other containers.  This is a good quality as food containers are expensive if you are constantly having to replace them.My favorite thing about these containers is the lid. Sounds silly but there is a reason for it. I don't carry a lunch box or bag. Instead I just through it in my extra large purse and go as I always have other things I'm toting in my hands, arms and mouth as well (I have 3 kids I drive to school every morning just picture it). These lids stay on securely and do not allow liquid to leak. The first time I threw one in my purse with soup not even thinking about it until I got to work to put it in the fridge, immediate panic kicked in. I carry my iPad, Samsung Note 4, camera and tons of other expensive stuff in my purse at all times. I was sooooo relieved to see not a single drop escaped from that container and my hundreds of dollars in electronics and makeup were completely safe.The lids also allow for stacking of the containers in the fridge with out the worry they will slide off and spill. Others I've had just had a smooth top making stacking nerve racking at times. I love a spa treatment, but I can't afford to go to a spa. Mainly because the closest one is 2 hours away and well that drive home would defeat the purpose anyway. I had the opportunity to try the Muddy Face mud mask and after reviewing the listed ingredients, I though I would give it a try. I love natural organic skin care products and this definitely fit the bill.The Muddy Face mud mask from Perfect Body Harmony comes premixed so you don't have to do the messy work. Just open the jar and apply. This Mask is super thick. I personally use a a fan brush to apply most mud masks to get even application over my whole face. When this arrived all of my fan brushes apparently ran away so I had to resort to traditional finger tip method. I was surprised when I applied this mask how easily it spread across my face. A little bit goes a long way and you can even a a few drops of water if needed to suit your personal preferences. It did not take long for the mask to dry. The directions say to leave on for 10-15 minutes then wash off.As the mask sat I could feel the mask tighten as it dried. I love that feeling as it makes me feel like its actually working. This mask is suppose to remove all the nasty dirt and grime build up and exfoliate the skin as well. When I rinsed of the mask I could actually see the difference. My face was more radiant and had a nice glow to it. The mask did not dry out my skin as others have been known to do which for me is important at the ripe age of 34 as we all know hydrated skin looks younger than dried up skin. I also like that I could not smell any perfumey scents from this mask. In fact it did not have any kind of smell to it.In the end I have to conclude that this Muddy Face mud mask from Perfect Body Harmony is well worth the money. It leaves skin clean, exfoliated, bright and hydrated.I received promotional pricing for the purpose of inspection and unbiased review.

Having dry skin due to my hypothyroidism is a constant battle. Despite the thinner formula, a little bit does go a long way and hydrates my skin for about 8 hours then I have to reapply again. It spreads evenly with out effort and absorbs quickly with out leaving the greasy sticky residue behind.This lotion has a slight floral scent to it thay does linger a bit. Many people like that but I personally prefer unscented lotions as most scents tend to give me migraines.This lotion comes in a 1.7 oz squeezable tube making dispensing simple. It is also the perfect size for carrying in your purse and travel. I do feel that the price for this product is a bit much for the amount you are getting. And since it doesn't keep me moisturized from morning until bed it wouldn't be practical for me.Promotional product provided for inspection and unbiased review.

This has to be the most gorgeous corset in my current collection. I love the black lace over the pink. Unfortunately I will not get to enjoy this and will have to gift it to a family member. This Sentey 2800mah power bank is awesome. Being that I often carry an Ipad, my Samsung galaxy Note3 phone and a small tablet all at the same time, I often find my self needing a quick charge for one of the three items while away from home. The Sentey 2800mah power bank packs quite a bit of power for its tiny size. This is about the size of a lipstick and is triangular shaped with rounded corners. It's super light weight too compared to the other power banks I have used that were similar in size. The Senty 2800 power bank comes nicely packaged in a tiny box, along with a power cord that works with most devices and a convenient carry case. The carry case is an added bonus to me as my previous banks did not have one so I was always searching for the bank, or the cord in the black hole known as my purse. With the carry case its all right there together and fits perfectly in the small front pouch on my purse. This power bank from sentey is super easy to use, just use the enclosed power cord to charge (usb end goes into adaptor the other end plugs into the bank for charging) the bank. Then, (this is the most important part to ensure you get proper use out it) make sure to keep your power bank with you. When your phone, camera, tablet ect starts screaming at you to charge your as it's hanging onto one bar of battery life, just plug in the usb end into the bank and connect your dying devise to bring it back from the dead. The best part about this bank, is that it DOES NOT get hot while using it. Thats important. I once had a bank that was so hot it burned my hand. This power bank from Sentey is a great value for the price and I highly recommend it to all my over loaded gadget friends for that emergency life support your dying device may need.

I absolutely LOVE this banana colored High Low Tunic Top with Split in the back I received from Brightly. It not only makes an adorable top to wear to my sales job, but its also just as cute with jeans on lazy Sunday as well. This top works well with palazzo pants, jeans and capris as well offering a large variety of looks. The top is true to it's size. I ordered an XL like I do most tops to fit my larger girls. I typically wear a Large to XL depending on fabric. Cotton like fabrics such as this top I usually get a L, but I wanted to ensure the high low feature didn't leave the front too short. This top was a bit big on me, which means I could have ordered my typical size L instead.The top is made of rayon and spandex making it a soft, breathable top that flows nicely with out clinging to those extra curves you prefer to hide. Also the scoop neck is not too wide unlike many others I have worn that often leave a bra strap showing. The sleeves come just to the elbows which is the perfect length for spring in my personal opinion.One of my favorite features of this tunic top from Brightly Essentials is the high low design of the top. I am a short gal at only 5ft 2 inches and the high low design helps make my legs appear longer. The front comes just below the hip line while the back and side nicely drape to the upper thigh level.I have to say the split back is my favorite feature overall. The top portion of the back over laps thin slightly splits allowing just enough of the junk in your trunk to appear. this design feature gives this top a sexy, yet modest appeal to it. It reveals just enough to get the imagination going I also like the split back because it allows for great air flow. This is important for me as I am very warm natured and finding clothes that are this breathable while still being modest is next to impossible.After washing and drying my Brightly Essentials High Low Tunic Top with split back I was please to know that all of the high quality stitching stayed intact, the color did not fade, and the size remained the same. One thing you do want to keep in mind is that if you happen to leave your top in the dryer over night, you will either want to turn the dryer on for a few minutes, or get out the iron as the fabric does crease and hold wrinkles. Fortunately they wrinkles come out very easily and quickly unlike other fabrics.Over all this top is high quality, well made top that will last. Best of all it is so versatile it can be worn in a professional environment dressed up with jewelry and heels or a more casual relaxed look with jeans, capris or shorts and sandalsPromotional pricing recieved for the purpose of inspection and honest unbiased review.
I love this make up pallet. the colors are very pigmented and do not have a lot of excess dusting.

I recieved this product in exchange for an honest unbiased review. Sadly this bubble blower quality is not good at all. Right out of the packaging the  bubble solution that was included was leaking. I was actually really impressed with this foaming leather cleaner! I have a pair of black and white wing tip DOC Marten low cut shoes and they are always filthy from work. What a great way to strengthen your vah-jay-jay. I have always been one to do my Kegel exercises ever since the horrid stories my child birth class nurse told us 14 yrs ago while I was pregnant with my son. Needless to say, I am well toned down below because of my exercise routine. These Kegal beads can add even more strength down under than just Kegal exercises. One trick I learned is to attach some weights to the looped end and just hold it as long as you can. Don't make the mistake I did and try 5lbs the first time. That darn weight, beads and all will come crashing down to your toes. Instead start with about a half a pound. Doesn't sound like much but it's harder than you'd think even with a man clamp like mine. I am sure there are an endless amount of uses for these beads, but if you're looking to tighten that baby up this is the way to go.These beads have a total of 2 beads attached to a string. At the end of the beads the sting is looped for easy removal, or for adding, what ever for extra weight or pleasure. The beads feel like a plastic material. Only issue I have to complain about is the seam where the beads are put together seems to scratch a bit when removing as if not fully together. That concerns me as that could lead to bacteria and funk growth if you do not properly clean your items. Other than that they are great.Promotional pricing recieved for the purpose of inspection and review

These reusable food pouches are a great idea for smoothies on the go, yogurt, apple sauce, pretty much anything that is messy when you're in a rush. Best of all you can pre-make food and freeze them too.These food pouches from Easy Anywhere are made from thick plastic like material that is durable and flexible. The material is BPA,PVC and Phthalate free. These pouches come in a large 7oz size that is both freezer and dish washer safe. The wide mouth opening makes them easy to fill, and the double zipper closure ensures no messes from accidental spills. Also, the screw on cap over the feeding opening locks on making it more secure as well. These pouches are bright blue in color and have a see through window on the back with measurements so you can see how much food is in the pouch. Cleaning these was supper easy. All I used was a cleaning brush and hot soapy water. No food stuck to the pouch but if you like more convenience you can throw them in the dishwasher as well.Over all these pouches are pretty amazing. They aren't just for toddlers in my opinion, but for any child up to age 10 for on the go snacks and smoothies too. These are sold in a 4 pack at an amazing price of  $13.99 and come with a 100% 90day money back guarantee.Promotional product provided free in exchange for inspection and an honest unbiased review.

I was offered this product at a special introductory rate for an honest unbiased review and decided to give it a try. I have had high cholesterol since I was in third grade due to bad genes despite an active healthy lifestyle. I also have Hypothyroidism which causes fatigue and frequent migraine headaches After researching CoQ10 benefits I figured this would give this a try. CoQ10 often used for:*Helping treat high blood pressure and heart disease*Enhancing immune system function*Providing an energy boost for people dealing with fatigue*Reducing high cholesterol levels in the blood*Stabilizing blood sugar levels of people with diabetes*Assisting in the treatment of cancer or the protection of organs from toxic chemotherapy drugs*Treating gum disease*Slowing down dementia progression*Preventing or treating migraine headaches .Since I started taking these, I have noticed that I am not as fatigued as usual. This is an amazing felling if you suffer from frequent fatigue as I do. Also, my migraines have reduced in frequency as well. I am really looking forward to the long term benefits of this product.I can not say how, if at all, it has changed my cholesterol as I haven't had any blood work done since I began taking these. But, with the results I have had already, I'm very optimistic.These capsules are easy to swallow and are not too big. There is no funky pill smell like many supplements have which for me makes it easier to take. I really love the fact that you get 9 months use out of one bottle. That makes this an AMAZING value. Over all I have had good results so far in a few areas that I suffer. So for me, I WOULD recommend this product.

Having lived through my own brand of second chance romance, I find when I read this type of story line I tend to be harder on characters then other books. I find myself a little judgmental and with a lot less mercy. Normally my harshness is always aimed towards the hero. Why? Because it seems like he always moved on, skirt to skirt, girl to girl.. Non relationship to non relationship before he sees the one he left behind. Then I see the heroine has usually had either nobody at all or very few.. No real moving on being done at all.So yea I was a little nervous when Kristen went this route again. But she took all my preconceived and biased notions and shook them up and sprinkled them over my head and said take that! While technically that's what happened her with Logan "High" Judd and Millie Cross. . This time I couldn't place them blame anywhere but at Millies feet. You'd never find a more loving or cherishing hero then the 20 something Logan. He absolutely adored this down to earth girl. Three years of adoration thrown in his face. Her reasons.. Her struggle... Not shared.. She just sent him away and it destroyed him. Two decades go by and then we see her sacrifice. Twenty years late.. The wall comes down. To be honest I was pissed the hell off that Logan didn't get the chance to even fight her demons back then. But I was quickly sucked into one hell of a vortex. The gloves came off and things went a little haywire.This was one hell of a rocky, cruel and nasty.. But strangely erotic dance to get to the beauty in Walk through Fire. Because fire had to be what burned away the guilt and the rage between these too. After the smoke cleared there was an absolutely amazing hero standing and waiting to love and adore Millie exactly and actually more profoundly then ever before. Logan didn't hold grudges, he didn't punish anymore, no he LOVED hard, raw, without reservation. Millie's scars stood no chance against the simple yet immensely healing love of Logan Judd.I find myself highlighting so much when I read this ladies work. This time I simply couldn't stop long enough to do that very often. I still found quite a few favorite parts of course but I found for one, Kristen Ashley is by far still the reigning queen of dialogue, a character talks and you better pay attention because every word uttered is something that can stop your heart or steal your breath. I was dizzy with those physical manifestations of wonder throughout this crazy ride. I was breathless and shaken and never wanted it to stop.I felt every emotion from swooning and all of the biker bada$$ flowery. I felt anger and frustration over the bratty antics of Zadie and absolutely in overload of sweetness for cuddly little kitties. But must of all I felt a healing warmth all the way through my soul, being witness to a couples journey, struggle and rise from the ashes while they  lay the past to rest and enjoy what today brought them.To take what was forged in their fire, and brush it off, make it shine and  cherish it together ..always.Thats a real love story. Because love is forgiving and patient and kind and sacrifices. Both lived it and earned it. 10 million stars for the Queen!

Loved seeing this sweet player fall so hard. Logan didn't know what hit him when he stumbled upon this secretive and feisty mystery of a girl. I'm a pro insta love addict and this was my fix.For safe zone readers.safe regarding other women after they meet but the first night he gave Kit aplace to stay there was a girl in his bed. She was asked to leave. I didn't care for the many references to his past. That usually doesnt bother me but because the heroine was upset each time it did. I loved that Logan acknowledged each feeling and experience with Kit was stronger and deeper. I felt his heart change which made all of this safe for me.Cliffhanger alert.Also my copy didnt have two versions. The one i read was mid steam
Sexy low angst. Ott alpha and innocent but feisty heroine.He didn't seem to be a manwhore at all.Like this author a lot.

So good. Funny, sexy and sweet. Hatter was adorable and Queen was pretty cool. Really can't wait to see more from this author. She is after my own heart.Totally safe.. This author said herself she'll always be safe.With every book I write, I give the Hera Leick Promise. I will never weave into my stories: cheating; sex outside the main characters; sexual abuse; cliffhangars; years of separation; man whores; and lastly my worst pet peeve, insta-love. If one sneaks in, I give you permission to shoot me. Please make note, however, guns are not legal in England. Neither is murder. I hope.Hera Leick, The Mad British

I have wanted Michael and Nikki's book since they first showed up in previous installments. I was so captivated by this story that I devoured it. I love that Lani keeps her characters loyal to each other even when they aren't together.  So just to clear up any misconceptions about what Miller said regarding Michael and other girls..it NEVER happened! This is not a spoiler. This is a fact that this author wouldn't go there! Lani doesn't write drama like that. Why? Because her stories stand on their own without contrived drama. That's why she's in my top 5 favorite authors ever!Lani ..just to let you know..Nikki owned Michael's heart even when they weren't together. Let's just say Michael was "branded' in a way ..forever. Michael was by far so amazing that I am really thinking he's probably my favorite hero of Lani ever. From the reason he quit being a Dr to how he stepped up to the plate when Nikki rocked his world, he was like a cement wall that would not be moved. He radiated strength and courage even when battling his mental issues. Nikki was the perfect fit for Michael because she knew what his lifestyle would entail having a brother living the same way. I was surprised by the Joslin transformation and simply baffled and amazed that Lani wrapped up their story like that. Totally a unique twist.Every time I end a book by this author I sit and close my eyes, savoring the peace and beauty she leaves in my heart. Being from Louisiana and my family being military and police officers just makes her books so personal to me. Even the fact that I'm in the medical field just has me finding so many similarities to my life and I can't get enough of her stories. Such humor but also such passion each story lives in my heart and breathes on its own. Love isn't strong enough of a word to how I feel beginning and ending each amazing tale she tells. Bravo Lani

This story was truly the sweetest and most romantic journey. I enjoyed the progression of two little 8 year old ninja turtle loving beings finding an instant connection that created a life of Beautiful moments.I swooned, laughed, cried and sighed. Tessa just has a way of pulling you into her stories and captivating you with so many emotions.  The humor is at the perfect level and the angst is just right. No upsetting jealousy drama and unnecessary plot devices will be found in this heartwarming story. That isn't to say that their journey didn't have pain and sorrow . These two had the triumph after the pain and the sun shining after the sorrow because everything they went through they did it together ...even when only one of them was carrying the other. I just have so many warm feelings right now. Jeremy and Sierra had the kind of love that so many hope for. So happy with how Tessa brought us full circle and even showed hints of the next generation. Sweet  Sizzling PERFECTION on every page.

Very sexy story with a big secret that took a tad too long to come out.. And caused some unnecessary angst for the heroine when if they had talked I guess we wouldn't have had a story. Very hot though.Both dated after high school separation.But the hero has been celibate for 3 years prior to them being reunited.  No om or ow drama.I loved Dane he was awesome.Look forward to more in this series.

Loved both characters and adored the sweetest progression of their feelings growing stronger and stronger.  Two discarded souls finding a home in each other.This fit my safety standards..No om or ow drama at all.I do not care about the past of the characters.

I saw Framed was coming by C. P Smith and even without knowing the blurb I was salivating. This lady knows what I love in my heroes and she just writes them exactly like I want. Kade saw the innocent Harley in high school as the perfect unattainable girl he would never deserve. From afar he wanted her so deeply. Little did he knew she was crazy about him too. Lost chances and missed opportunities had years fly by and a failed marriage for Harley was in her rear view mirror while the battlefield a war for the Seal Kade. When next they meet its at Renault prison and Harley is aiming to possibly get closer to Kade and with everything in her heart she believes he's innocent.From this point on this story is a wonderful seduction of the senses with so much mystery and suspense along with passionate encounters.Kade didn't waste time letting Harley know how long he'd wanted her. I loved their back and forth banter. Things were constantly jumping and making me guess. There were some gross and creepy bad guy points of view that had me nauseated. But I was relieved those parts didn't last too long. I adored the Brute Squad and Harley's Dad just stole my heart. I was in romantic suspense heaven throughout this awesome read. I simply can't wait for more each time I see The End after reading anything from this author.

I'm seriously in a very sappy yet happy place when I find authors and books who give me true heroes. Heroes who adore and cherish their women. From the moment these two were brought together on the page I literally felt their connection vibrating. The words were brimming with emotion and heat. Whether it was the sarcasm and sexually charged banter or the swooning sexy comments from Payne.. I was in my own version of perfection amongst the pages. Having discussed the finer points of what makes a hero.. A real hero.. with this beautiful kind author via email, I found a kindred spirit in this sweet lady. Stacy agrees that the leading men in love stories should know what they want and not waver. Payne was everything I love. Yea he did have a pretty sexed up past but he totally changed the moment Becks fell in his arms. I absolutely love epilogue with marriage and babies and if I could recommend any book to any of my safety buddies I would definitely say Rachel if you haven't already stumbled upon this on then jump in.Totally safe all the way. Some small humorous references to a past hook up he had but nothing that caused any drama.. No other women at all. He was gone for Becks from day one. Beautiful amazing hero in every way. I am diving into book two now. Stacy.. There's a huge pressure out there to write all of these damaged A-hole heroes.. The ones who hurt the heroine over and over but miraculously change at the end. Romance doesn't have to hurt and heroes do not have to sleep around or lie just so they can change.. Why not be a good guy from the start? So please lady keep writing heroes who show what the meaning of romance and love stories really are. You'll find that there are so many women who really don't need all that angst that's just not romantic at all. So summing up Ms Gail, please don't lose that special love inside that breathes life into your men. We really need real heroes.

When I began reading Romance I was probably maybe 12..then it was V C Andrews and was definitely beyond my age.  Years later I read historical romance and devoured them.  I left historical in the dust years ago but after this fantastic gem I think it's awakened my love again.  With all of my triggers now a days I think this genre will be just perfect to read in between all the angsty  Contemporary books.First of all my safety triggers are not necessarily more lax than others but let's say they are more direct.  Like what's in the past for me is the past.  I only care about the present story.  At first due to an incorrect marking and subsequent review by another safety buddy, I thought this was a celibate hero.  That wasn't the case but.. Here is where my safe issues are different.These two children were babies and shared one very chaste kiss when she was only 14 years old.  Then suddenly she leaves and the hero a child himself thinks he'll never see her again.  So yea he has one night stands.. While never really moving on in the emotional sense.  In this Era of course the heroine remained a virgin.  When Luke finds out she's coming back to town, he immediately stops seeing the saloon girls.  He wants Esme and he wastes no time marrying her.  It had so much humor and even the perfect amount of angst.  The foster boys stole my heart right along with how amazing Luke was to raise all those lost boys.  I adored everything about this book.As far the safety.. Nothing about his past is in your face.  Its mentioned that he had those girls.. But he actually says after the fact that he regrets it and he'd have never touched anyone if he knew she'd ever come back.  He also knew he'd  never love or marry another.  I really just absolutely loved every moment.  Devoured it.
This is a life saver

This was the most unique MC book I've read. For one, all of the negative things I don't like about the mainstream MC reads was absent. No club whores, no other women at all. Just a guy who made some bad choices that gets a second chance at life. The person he wasn't expecting was Tes who is none other than his probation officer. Things aren't all romantic in this fast moving read though. It's mostly suspense and a lot of nail biting moments. Then one sexy as sweet HEA epilogue wrapped it up perfectly. If you like romantic suspense that's not all about the sex but more about mystery and redemption then this one is for you. Kindle unlimited available too. Can't go wrong.

3.5 StarsGabe was awesome. After I started liking him again that is. At first he just made me mad. Then Bea made me mad. Took a while to like the characters at all.This had a rocky start and I hung in there. I felt that things just had to play out a certain way to make the love between Bea and Gabe believable. It worked in the end.Way more mystery and suspense than romance. I am in a sappy mood so if I had read this at a different time in my life I'd probably have loved it more.

Miller Genuine Spurlock was a hero in the truest definition. From the moment he took Mercy into his sheltering arms after her tragic attack, I was head over heels for this huge larger than life man. Mercy was beyond brave and really grabbed life by the balls. She was funny and kind. What was beautiful was that they became such close friends. Lani of course gave us the craziness of silly friends and family. Letting us visit with past favorites while teasing us with future possible stories to come. This was a unique love story that treasured life. I admire this author for her beliefs and her strength in not caving to the public pressure of writing what others want.. But writing what's in her heart. I for one feel safe while reading Lani's stories because every time I visit her whacky and crazy but beautiful sexy world I know I'll feel at home and like I can just relax and enjoy down to earth love stories where faith, family and freedom to love and protect those special to us is celebrated.Keep dreaming Lani, I'll be right there ready to dive in.

I'm so totally in love with the amazing characters that this gifted author creates in every single story. Foster had some history that included wallbanging sex that almost ended up as negligent homicide by fornication. Yea, pretty big man slut, that is what Foster was before his accident. I was happy to read that when the wall came down though the man slut hung up his bed hopping card. Then the terrifying accident came and Foster changed in more ways than one. This brave and amazing guy didn't let this keep him down.. He used it to make him stronger. That's not saying he wasn't worried that a woman might see him as less. But thankfully the woman that caught his eye and his heart was a spitfire that saw he was a man of Steel even before his leg was put on each day. Blake was probably the most vulnerable heroine Lani has written to date in my opinion. She felt like she had been abandoned after her cheating ex and the divorce that decided assets and friends. Even to the point of her mom picking sides.This left her with a feeling of not being good enough. But Foster quickly showed her she was desirable and lovable. He wasn't perfect but even when he made the most stupid choices.. (certain neighbor he left to sit with Blake) he made up for it and sometimes a simple I'm sorry goes a long way. He replaced all those bad memories with good ones and brought amazing people into her life to be called her new family.Of course the crazy family brought Lani's signature humor to the story and before I knew it I was totally lost in the story. One of my favorite characters in this story was not a person..but he didn't know that.Boom goes the dynamite! Boris sang.Every time they had sex this bird cracked me up!! Mystery and action always plays a huge part and Lani balances this with the sexy and sweet love story with blazing scenes of passion between Foster and Blake. I will say I cried like a baby a few times. With the best ending and epilogue ever I'll remember this story for a long time. I am so happy this author writes like the energizer bunny because I just can't wait for more.

My heart is so full right now that it's nearly overflowing. When a series that has given me so much beauty comes to and end its bittersweet.Kristen did perfect justice to Merry and Cher. The way she brought these two together was absolutely brilliant. It was a delicate balance with Merry's past. Cher was not only a kick ass heroine, she was full on strong woman. At times that strength pushed her walls too high but thanks to inside and outside influences those walls stood no chance against what fate had in store for these two.When Kristen creates a hero, she takes every part of what's good and solid in the world and adds in bad ass and attitude along with honor and loyalty. Garrett Merry Merrick was all of the above with some really smart-assed elements thrown in. He needed that edge and that sarcasm to deal with all that was Cher. Merry was such a real man, one who wasn't afraid to take care of his woman and by extension everything and everyone who mattered to her. I simply kept wanting to shout YES so many times because this man really was perfect even when he wasn't. The heat in this book was above and beyond the hottest ever. There were blazing love scenes that left me feeling deeply and every single one had such profound emotional depth. Scenes that had me read them more than once. More than erotic, more than passionate. Sheer beauty that takes your breath away. Then I could go on and on about the cast of fabulous characters that Kristen sprinkled throughout . From the painful yet healing conversations between Dave and Merry that had me in tears and gosh I just felt like my heart would burst. The sweetest moments between Merry and Rocky ..ahh the swooning that Merry caused. Such a loving brother and friend. Then Cher building friendships with the ladies of the Burg. So many laugh out loud moments. Even the funny moments between Merry and Mike. Mike grinned at the windshield. Domestic bliss already? Dont know, but youll be the second to know when I do.Mike chuckled.  From laughing together and even when Mike pissed Merry off simply was authentic Kristen Ashley.  The one thing I love about the relationships that this brilliant author creates is that they seem just real like friendships are realistic in the fact these guys might argue but in the end of the day they have each others back. Just like family. So every single character that showed their face in this epic read had my full attention. There was a star though and he wasn't a bad ass yet but was on his way to being one in full force. Yes, Ethan stole the show. That little man was amazing and brave. More names from so many books in the series that  just added that Kristen Ashley fantastic edge. Love . passion, suspense and family this series will always be held dear to my heart. Seeing favorites and revisiting stories had me in tears that were bittersweet. Of course even though I wanted it to go on and on..the end had to come. There is no one out there that can do magic in a epilogue like this superbly talented author. So many insights of the futures of our favorites and maybe hopefully .. Crossing fingers and toes ..insights in to future story lines. No matter what Kristen .. Girl you are just full up with author badass brilliance. Write on lady..we can't wait for what you have in store for us.

*Kindle unlimited *I loved this virgin hero so much. I thought his innocent but sweet devotion was amazing. This was a debut for this author and I see really good things for her.The love scenes were scorching. I do wish there had been less mention of the heroines past during certain scenes. It took away from what was going on. Her dominant attitude wasn't my cuppa either. I like more aggressive heroes. But he was so adorable. I also wish that the heroine hadn't acted like she did the morning after. Thankful she didn't take long to realize her error. I'd have liked to have had more information about the "falling" and what was going to happen to Garon. Usually paranormal romance has more world building and there's a foundation for how that fantasy world is there. I will definitely read more in the future from this author. I hope she adds more history and characters to her next story.Safety info:Hero was virgin since he was an angel.But he had to see her numerous lovers over the years. Heroine was pretty active too. She knew he was there watching but thought she was going crazy. I didn't like that she knew and still did those things and thought of the hero.I wouldn't call this a totally safe book.. But once he falls and they meet neither are with others. They do talk about her past and some of those times bothered me.If you read this do it for the hero.

Oh Luke ..wow you are one intense sexy man. I loved this one so much. Single parent romances are some of my favorites. There was quite a bit of drama with unwanted people , but Lani handles it with the perfect balance. Reese and Luke were really hot together and funny too. I can't wait to continue in this series. Lani is just exactly what I want in my romance.

*Kindle Unlimited Review*Five Minutes Lateby Sonora Seldon5 of 5 starsbookshelves: 15-safe-zone-add, 1-safe-no-cheating-no-ow-om, 15-kindle-unlimited, 2015-augustRead from August 25 to 28, 2015I had extreme and varying emotions while reading this book. I know our love of a story can greatly be affected by our own person struggles and even things we are going through at the time we read a book.I fell hard for Devon from the start. I even fell hard for the heroine Ashley. This girl was so strong and brave. She was funny and protective. Devon was a puzzle and to truly get the emotional depth of this story you'd have to experience. I did have some things that took away some enjoyment but its just my own hang ups. But all in all this was a beautiful story.
*Kindle Unlimited*Mystery, humor, some steam, and an attention grabbing plot.I can see myself reading more from this author.Safe zone approved. 100%

Annalisa Nicole is like this little fairy who sprinkles me with romanctic perfection when I read her stories. This time I went in blind with trust..I DID NOT READ THE SYNOPSIS!!So there was laughter.Mystery.AngerSadness.Fear and at times hopelessness.But as in the true Annalisa Nicole magic fairy dust way she slowly brought me to a satisfying conclusion with love and peace in my heart.River was arrogant, selfish and sometimes rude. That was his first layer.Like water before it boils..River slowly showed the ripples in his angry facade. Jos was the fire that started him simmering..heating up all the memories and torments..making him face everything. To feel everything and to SEE everything.This read had me mesmerized and consumed. I read it in one sitting and even when I hurt so bad and wanted to throw my previous against the wall.. I couldn't stop..I had to see.. I just had to see.I did.I saw hope, peace, forgiveness.I truly did see Love.
