Sexy and sweet. I at first was a little irritated with Justine but really felt she woke up and realized how lucky she was to find such a sweet and sexy guy.. Was no way taboo. It was just right.

There was something just so romantic about this second chance romance. These two were not even sure they'd ever see each other again but saved themselves for each other .  I love that Lani always gives me loyal, faithful characters and sexy and funny stories. Suspense that has me biting my nails with the perfect balance of peaceful times too. The friendships and family bonds she weaves into these stories just affect me so deeply. It's like you really get to know these people. I can't wait to dive into Downys story and I am only a little sad that I'm almost caught up with her books. I'm so glad she is a writing machine.Keep feeding my addiction Lani.

The first 50% bugged me with the triangle vibe. Then I liked Jason so I kept reading. T love shifter books but one part went past my comfort zone. I did like the writing and it flowed well. I just liked this one..didn't love it.I need to add the the majority of the safe readers like reading the heroine with other men so they had this marked as safe.There are some of us who don't want to read our heroines or heroes with other people. This is not a safe book. The heroine kisses another man several times , dances with him till she us turned on. She did do these things due to thinking that the hero didn't want her but to me ..it still made me nauseated to read it and so this book really isn't safe at all. It wasn't cheating ..but it even felt like cheating to her. The hero part is safe so those readers who like the women who do those things but not the men will be happy. I felt like I wanted her to be stronger.

From the start of this one I felt like I had so many moments of What??? then Oh ok..whew! Lani did you decide to mess with our heads a bit on this one? I got mad. I laughed. I cried. I laughed some more. It was HOT. It was beautiful. It was pure Lani Lynn Vale's magic. Totally digged everything from the age difference.. to the surprises. Even the angsty moments were handled in just the right way. Another totally safe read with one sexy hot perfect hero.

Mike and Nicole were fun and sexy together. This book had so much drama regarding exes that I at times thought my head would explode. But they stayed true to each other and sometimes it just made me laugh at how crazy those other characters were. Mike was really a good guy and I'm so glad he got his HEAThey came full circle in a lot of ways and it was really a beautiful epilogueI am left curious about some things Ben said regarding his relationship with his late wife. It almost seemed like he wasn't all that happy with her. I don't usually read dead ex stories because I always feel like the new love is only there because they didn't have the late spouse anymore. That they'd not be together at all..kind of like second place. I know its just how a story is presented though so hoping Bens is believable and the new love doesn't seem like second choice.This was a safe book..even with the exes as neither Mike or Nic did anything but get mad at them

I wanted James story for so long. I am so full of just happiness and more right now. Lani just takes me on a journey each time and I always find that I"m in a very good place when I close the book. I loved every character and adore Lani for always giving us perfect heroes who adore their woman and stay faithful. James was sometimes a little dense but he's a man ..and he was a truly all man. I loved the interactions with the kids and the banter had me laughing so hard.Another winner always.

From the very moment Jack held Winter's hand moments after meeting her, I was in love with this book. Lani has the extraordinary ability to create love stories I can believe in. Characters that are loyal from the first meeting to the HEA. She proves in every single book that unnecessary drama and angst between the lead couples isn't needed to pad a story. There won't be cheating or whoring heroes and that is something I absolutely love her for. Jack was the most steadfast hero I have read in so long. To stay celibate and honor his vows even after death .. Proves how this author honors the vows of love. I adore her secondary characters as much as the leads and there is always dialogue that has me laughing out loud to moments of such deep emotion that the tears flowed freely. I will say this couple had the most tragic road of any I've read of Lani and I can't imagine how it must have felt to be in her mind and heart as this book was written. Sadness , healing and then beauty and joy were captured perfectly along side an epic couples love story that I didn't want to end. I'm so absolutely head over heels in book love with all this author writes. Diving into the next one soon.

OK so I think I realize now why I absolutely love and adore Lani Lynn Vale's writing style. It's because it just seems so down to earth. From laugh out loud funny moments to sobbing emotional ups and downs. The fact is this author just gives me authentic stories with just enough fictional suspense that it sucks me in and keeps me there. Max and Payton couldn't have fit more perfectly together. I just really fell hard for this couple. Lani doesn't steep her stories in jealousy or other women drama. It's not necessary to make a love story work and this author knows it. Her heroes are loyal and they aren't afraid of falling and aren't afraid of family. I'm so hooked on this author I might need therapy. As of right now Lani holds the number one spot on my Safe author list. Suspense, sexy times and crazy family with authentic love stories. I simply just love it.

We LOVE AquaBeads in our house - boys and girls.  It would be nice if they made the packaging a bit more welcoming to all types of kids because it is fun for all!  We found the tray/platform great for containing bead messes and getting beads in and out of.  The creations are fun and pretty sturdy.  Of course if your 3 yr old grabs in and starts body slamming it, it's going to break....  so have your children do this when the little ones are asleep.I have children who are OT challenged - and this is a FANTASTIC OT skill playset

I am always looking for books that my young boys will be interested in, it's harder to get them to want to sit down and read.  This book is cute and they love dogs and pirates and hi-jinks, so perfect!  This book has lots of pictures to keep beginning readers following along while they sound out and figure out words.  It will appeal to both genders and different types of kids.

I have been looking for a butter keeper for awhile, especially since we typically buy really fresh butter.  This is great and it's a gorgeous container - it looks modern and beautiful on the table.  You do have to remember to put in fresh water every few days but once you get the hang of it, just add it your plant watering line-up :)

If you want to learn how to be customer obsessed while growing your business, then Joseph Michell has the answer. Learn to shift your company from a product cycle orientation to customer centric model. Build brand, build luxury, build relationships. The writing is short, concise and too the point. It is however in-depth enough on topic to make you critically think. From real world examples to strategy and analysis, this quick read is well worth it.

In general I don't particularly like the Annie Chun brand. I don't find the flavoring and textures to be too authentic, generally bland. I was pleasantly surprised with these crisps. They are rather unique, somewhere between a seaweed snack and a rice cracker. They have a salty flavor as to be expected with a noticeable sweetness. As an occasional treat they are pretty yummy, as a healthy snack they are high in sodium and sugar.Pros> Unique Texture.> Crispy like a cracker, but airy like a Munchos chip.> Beautiful two-tone presentation.> Satisfies the sweet and salty craving.Cons> High in sodium (8%DV)> High in sugar (Not Reported as DV, but masked as a seasoning)> Not a healthy snack alternative

This book is a really fast and easy ready, 2-3 hours tops.  It's an inspiring story and really encouraging to see such lovely stories for the youth.  I even shed a tear or two.  It really talks about bullying and being brave in a relatable way that doesn't shove it down your throat.

The kids dug right into this puzzle when it arrived tonight.  It's really colorful and a great size for small or OT challenged hands.  The Mudpuppy quality is excellent - this puzzle will last for a long time.Tip - After putting it together we extended the fun, counted the wheels, vehicles, birds, puppies, colors of vehicles.  The kids had a lot of fun!
Really great quality, nice depth and weight.  I love Lenox items for easy gifts for those that help us in our lives - teachers, carriers, etc. This is a beautiful item and gift-ready.

This cat tree is quite large.  It's taller than my preschooler who loves playing "cat" with it. It has many scratching posts, batting balls and spinning things.  It is also quite heavy and durable. we put together in less than 10 minutes.
I am very happy with these washcloths. The scrubbing side works well on my pots and pans. So far they have held up well although it does feel like the webbing may tear eventually.
Very gorgeous and delicate in person. I can imagine a tree full of white Lenox ornaments.  This would be a wonderful gift for a teacher or other memorable person.

A tiny bit goes a long way. It's very smooth and gentle on my sensitive skin.  It is not over-drying and my skin feels great after using it.  I did not notice any heavy scents but my super-sensitive eyes did feel slightly irritated as it got near.  A lot less that similar products but still.

I think this works really well for mild cases, try to leave step 1 on hair/head overnight for best results.  I am confused about the everyday preventative spray, should I be using that for the rest of my child's days?  'Cause it's highly fragrant in a noticeable way - I'd rather not send them to school like that all the time.  Of course you never know when a case of the head lice will pop up..

This is my second product from Begin Again.  I am really impressed with the quality but also the ingredients of it all.  These toys are made from rubberwood (like a bamboo) and are dishwasher safe.  Most of the toys are made in China and packaged in US, but there are a few toys made in the US, check out their website faq to find out which ones.  I also like how their toys double as learning, play, and puzzle.  Begin Again even though out so thoroughly to design the tray as a kitchen.  My kids enjoy it, we have lots of fun playing together.

This bus toy is the quality you expect from Melissa and Doug but also very funcitonal for multiple aged children.  The younger ones enjoy the shape-sorter aspect of the toy, and fitting the numbers in like a puzzle.  The preschoolers/Kindergarten age enjoy the included math cards and using the numbers to solve the math problems.  All kids enjoy the real wheel bus action.  Mom and Dad enjoy the classic design and color, no crazy rainbow bright plastic toy!

4 stars because they meet my children's needs.  They want to feel like they are wearing big boy pants even though they are not ready to.  These are great for the kids having accidents for a variety of reasons but especially for those with delays of potty training due to other special needs and who actively want to feel like their peers.  I deducted one star because the size range is huge 38-100lbs, my child is closer to the 38 and these are quite bulky on him, much bigger than a pull-up.  These will fit a child a bit larger better and not so cumbersome.

This is gorgeous, one of the more beautiful pieces of wearable tech.  I am a slave to my Samsung Fit Gear but excited to try the Up2.  The Up2 blends in seamlessly as jewelry and is not as distracting as a smart watch. It is truly aimed towards the fitness/health consumer - so if that is you this is your pony.  It's more attractive that a Fitbit, works with multiple phones, and I have had no errors or issues.  I will still wear my Samsung watch most of the time, because I am more into the notification arena of wearable tech - as a busy mom I don't want to miss an important text or call and I am always checking the time on it.  For me the activity tracker is secondary.

I bought these for a wedding in Texas and they were PERFECT.  Although not leather, these were truly comfortable and still looked pretty decent, I found them quite impressive for the price point.  There is LOTS of room around the calf and ankle.  I ordered a size up so I could put in inserts, I do that with the majority of my shoes because I have feet issues....I am happy to say I wore these 3 days in a row, all day/night/danced my hindquarters off and still had ZERO foot pain.Color - Dark Gray, not a true black.  gorgeous, goes with EVERYTHING.

I loved my other LEGO bag (heritage) so much I bought another for my other LEGO-loving child.  I love this, it's a great size (not too small, not too big...) and lightweight. It easily fits school work and standard size notebooks and folders (plus lunch and water bottles!).  The quality is superb, I have no doubt this will last a long time. For my smaller child, I also like the clip on the front so the backpack stays on the shoulders.

Finally some a 'real' business book.  The last several I have read focus so much on technology, social media, seo, etc.,  while all good things the CORE BEING of an entrepreneur and real leadership is not defined by the latest IPO trend.  Author Tobak provides insights, part memoir, part business advice.

This Battat Roadster is quite durable which is fantastic because my rough and tough pre-schooler plays with it non-stop (and throws it non-stop when frustrated).  If your child is as obsessed with cars and taking things apart, this will provide many hours of entertainment over the course of the week.  Taking the wheels on and off is an endless repetitive past time. At first somewhat annoying to do myself 15+ times a day but now (after a few weeks) he has gained the coordination and skill and does it himself.  In fact, he gets made if I try to help out.  Also, we never bothered to put batteries in, we just use our manual hand power.

Really adorable sweater. It's acrylic so not going to last forever but will hold up well and not shrink in the wash.  It's not my favorite material since I prefer natural but with kids they need something a bit more durable.  Also, liquids roll right off of this - helping stains not set in too quickly.  It is really unisex in nature, being navy blue with straight pockets  I am sizing it as large because my 3 yr old is bigger than a 5 yr old and typically wears a 4t or larger but this sweater fit him perfectly.

Vodka Tonic, Gin & Tonic, yes, please!  These drinks are my old friends that I abandoned because I can't use the extra sugar and calories from the tonic water.  I have searched for an acceptable replacement but "diet tonic" is straight up chemicals and club soda just doesn't do it.so in walks Zevia and life is MUCH better.  It's not as great as traditional tonic but pretty damn good.  Compared to other tonic water (not diet) it is less sweet in general, almost a dry taste.  Now if I can only find a bar that serves this.
The Magic 8 ball is always a great gift and lots of fun for all ages.  I have bought one as a gift multiple times.  This Frozen update makes it fun for young Frozen fans.

Sue Mengers is a very interesting character with quite the life.  This biography was not an easy nor pleasant read. Author Kellow knows his subject very well and is quite knowledgeable but it as lacking narrative, story, something to help it flow more as a great read than just a list of years and events and conversations.

So this rescue bot product is a little on the cheaper side but my boys LOVE it, so I am giving it 4 stars.  Also, boats that you play with hat are better quality by Imaginext or other brands also clock in at a much higher price point.  So you get what you pay for.The boat itself is multiple parts but relatively easy to put together.  The crane is a big hit with my kids, they need to "rescue" everything.  I am disappointed that Cody and Servo are cardboard cutouts because the kids are excited by them.  I know they will soon be in the garbage.  Rather than be so clearly wasteful, it may have been better to include nothing for those characters.

This is an all around great product.  The toy is very family friendly, it's challenging enough to balance everything and the younger kids take delight when the animals crash.  Other things that make this 5 stars - non-toxic, non-plastic, no batteries, a charitable donation made by the company.Bonus Play - Have your kids try to fit the animals back in the convenient wood case, it's like a puzzle doing so!

This is simply a great simple toy made a bit more interactive.  Of course we all have the puppets that we attempt to disguise our voices for and maybe that works for the under 12 months set, but quickly they catch on or maybe mom and dad are feeling exhausted and not so creative at the moment.  DJ the Dinosaur saves the day with his built in phrases.  The kids have been thoroughly entertained.  It's also SO easy to toss in a diaper bag or stroller for trips to the dr or errands.  My child loves when DJ helps take his temperature or feed him a spoon.

We purchased six of these tables for our shop. We actually don't use them to hold tools, but rather in a clean room for doming auto parts. We need level tables for the curing process. On a budget, these tables are good quality and the leveling feet are a nice feature not found on most tool tables, particularly ones at this price point. I will definitely consider shop fox in the future.

I love reading books on business, but I could not even make it past page 31. It failed to hit the mark on inspiration for me and I tried. Abrasive and arrogant in tone I fell asleep twice reading it. I had hopes for it as I do consider myself rather relentless in my ambitions, but Hayzlett is not the pony you should bet on.

These are the SOFTEST bamboo wash cloths I have ever used.  I have tried 2 other brands on the quest to make my own re-usable wipes.  These hold up very well in the wash and are the perfect size for the little ones.  I like them so much, though, I stole one for my sensitive face cleaning.  I accepted these in exchange for an honest review.

For the price, it's hard to beat this lock. At a generous eight feet in length it's easy to lock both the front and back wheel on my 63cm bike. It's thick enough that it feels secure, but not so thick that it weighs several pounds and can be bothersome to take along I still prefer my trusty Abus chain lock when biking to areas where my bike may not be secure or leaving it somewhere overnight.I also use it to lock up a stroller when I don't feel like lugging it into a building on visits with friends or family. Because of the generous length you can pretty much attach the lock to just about any fixed object, something that can be hard to do with a standard chain lock.

High end luxe candles are a thing now.  I have received a few as hostess gifts and also give as gifts for those not quite so personal people in my life.  This Ovando candle is one of the BEST, hands down.  If you are looking for FRAGRANCE that is OFF-THE-CHARTS.  Burn this for a few hours and any party will smell delicious.  It's simply fantastic and will last about a month.

Amazing Waves - Very light and not crunchy at all.  It's still a mousse though, so acts in the hair like  a  mousse and not like a heavier oil spray or styling cream  I recommend this for fine curly hair and not thick curly hair.  Also it smells GREAT.

This book is for the true nerds - you know scientists and engineers (JK....sort of).  I am relieved to know that I am not quite the nerd I thought I was.  This book is well laid out, you can easily skip to sections relevant to your network (aka career climbing) challenges.  I don't recommend it if you are a less technical nerd and instead get something a bit more basic.  If you are a dumbed-down nerd like myself, then I am sure there is a networking for dummies book out there awaiting us.  If you value tech jargon and "big" words, are scared of the financial type folks, then this is your guide.  I swear - you will love every letter of it.

Tip - Wash & Dry these before using if you like them extra soft.I have already washed these several times and they hold up so well.  I don't use them for your regular uses but as a "bib" for my older yet still drooling SN toddler.  These bandannas are muchly appreciated - my toddler likes that it appears more like an outfit accent than walking around with a "baby" bib.

I loved getting this issue delivered to my home on the day of it's release and well protected in a keepsake box.  As a huge fan of September Vogue, there is nothing more upsetting than when a postal worker tries to cram the extra thick issue into a small mailbox and tears it.  On a side note, so not a fan of the cover art but adore Beyonce, this just isn't a good look.

I love the convenient size and easy transport-ability but found it to be lacking in flavor and overly salty.  This is a good base, if you have other items on hand to spice it up a bit and perhaps some fresh horseradish.  I would buy this again if I was going on a picnic or traveling and wanted to make bloody marys - also great for airplane blood marys.

This is a great booster seat for the price, it's really large so be careful in small cars where you may need multiples or booster + car seat. The large size means it's going to work well for your kids for a long time.  It feels extremely sturdy and great quality so I am sure it will hold up for your child until they age out.  I love that the cover is remove-able for an easy wash.  My child loves the dual built in cup holders, one for snack, one for a drink.  I think it's a great booster in it's price range - I do believe that it won't be that comfy for a long ride in the car although my child has yet to complain.  The more expensive boosters seem to be a bit more comfortable/padded.

I felt that the first few times this product was BS and kept playing around with settings and putting in on differently......well, I finally got it right.  By the 4th time I was so sore in the morning - I thought I had done an intense ab-focused yoga session. So, I  took a few days of rest from it.  Then got back on it.  I do agree with other reviewers,  it doesn't go to the deep deep core muscles - still need to do that training as well as regular fat reducing exercise. I am not deducting stars for that, anyone should realize you can't strap on a belt and get thinner while sitting on the sofa watching Prime.Tip - You really need at least 60 to start - anything lower is not doing much, the higher you can get up the better.  Make sure it's a firm fit, in the right place - off just a little and my ribs or hip bones are vibrating.

Having a small chopper is incredibly handy - I use it for quick salsa's to baby food.  I lived and breathed with my tiny Cuisinart for many years until I cracked the blade (in the dishwasher, not recommended).  I am impressed with the Nesco especially the feed in tube on top - makes things SO much easier when adding a bit of liquid or more items.

You can sweep your carpet or squeegee your hard floor but you can't sweep your floor with this broom or squeegee your carpet.  I was not impressed and it's small and doesn't work well standard dust pan.  Also doesn't fit together very well.

I love the ingredients in this shake - fermented items, mushrooms, lots of vegan protein.  These are things I subscribe too!  I mix it with almond milk, banana, and some peanut butter - It comes out a bit sweet because of the Stevia, It's really yummy, like so delicious even my kids want to dip their fingers in and drink it.  I don't recommend giving to kids though without a pediatric Dr or nutritionist involved.  If you aren't use to the flavor Stevia imparts, try something less expensive first - it's an aftertaste you have to become accustomed to.

no complaints - I have taken many various probiotics and these are great - no aftertaste, easy to swallow.  There isn't a lot to say about probiotics but I notice a better digestive cycle and better skin when I take them regularly.  I am sensitive to dairy so don't like to eat a lot of yogurt, these are dairy-free (but not vegan.)
Standardized sized capsule, easy to swallow.  I have had no side effects but really can't verify any claims after two weeks but will continue to take and update.
No issues so far with my Samsung S4 Active - will update if that changes in the next few months.  32GB is nice but nothing major, I want to try a 128MB or larger next!

I have purchased and reviewed many steam mops, this one seems impressive at first but is near to the bottom compared to the many others I used.  (It's not in last place only because I had one steam mop completely die on my after about a month).This is a smaller foot print compared to others, so great for small places. Also, it heats up so fast!!!  The attachments are cool, and it double as a fabric steamer is nice, no need to purchase that.  The metal attachment did wonders for my grout.  I felt the attachments and mop it self did not cover enough surface area for my preferences, it took me longer to do things.  Also feels flimsy and I destroyed one of the brushes on first use by pressing too hard.  I also found that water leaked a lot, especially in handheld mode.In short, if you think you want to steam clean everything around your house, floors, appliances, bathroom fixtures, etc - this is your tool.If you want quick steam mopping with good floor coverage, look at other models.

I have been using the Juice Green Apple Peel for 5 or more years and I swear by it - If you have sensitive, acne-prone and rosacea-prone skin this peel is wonderful.  The Clear Skin kit is perfect for sampling other Juice products or having travel sized products.  I am equally in love with the cleanser finding it gentle yet treating.  I am not impressed with the moisturizer, it feels a bit sticky and irritates my sensitive skin.  I do like the blemish clearing lotion but I only apply it every other day because (again) sensitive skin!!

Great book for the super car/plane obsessed child.  There is a lot of text (all very interesting!) so for your older child - aka not a bedtime store.I wish there were a few more illustrations and colorful photos.

I am not a DJ but I am a serious music lover and I but a LOT of headphones.  I work in a noisy environment where I often to need to take off my headphones and converse with others.  These are perfect for my life, the sound is superb in the manufacturing environment, drowning out machinery and producing quality audio.  I love how easy it is to flip out the ear piece and not take off the whole head set when needed.What I noticed first about these headphones is the weight and clearly superb manufacturing.  You will feel the difference when you hold these in your hands and when you wear them on your head - yep as other reviewers have noted, they are heavy and will take some time to get use to if you have not worn similar quality and heft.

First and Foremost Dress Kids Girl is just a really cute doll!  She is soft, bright, cuddly.  The dressing challenges are an added bonus that keeps my child interested in her for a bit longer than usual.  He tries to do the button and buckle and then proceeds to put his dolly on the potty or tricycle.  It is by far his favorite one.

I have done the Juice from the Raw cleanse several times - I love them - it's one of the best with quality ingredients at a great price point.  The last time I ordered I got the wrong order (for the 1st time).  I immediately contacted the vendor and they shipped out the correct juices immediately.  Thanks!!!

My son is obsessed - he has not taken them off since we gave them to him.  I think he will try to wear them all winter.  The lights are BRIGHT, so beware if you think your child may be distracted.  We have already washed them 3 times and the lights are still going strong.

This LeapFrog oven has a lot of ridiculously catchy songs, I find myself singing them when I am in my own kitchen making croque madame or whatever - put an egg on it yeah yeah.  It's fun, most of the food can store inside or on top for easy shelving when not in play.  I think it's a fun way to learn about numbers (turn the over dial to the number it says!) but also about food which is helpful for my picky eater!

This was mostly a bio and re-hash of Tess's experiences and a few other similar stores from people she has encountered in her life.  While I found a lot of Tess' bio and achievements interesting it wasn't exactly what I was hoping to get out of the book.  I was hoping to get exactly what Tess said the book wasn't and more inspiration to make a leap for those of bound to more financially or dependents (children, elders, etc).

I have a soft spot for stories where kids go spend summers with relatives.  It's just such a lovely thought and experience.  Sparkling Jewel adds in a horse ranch and sisters - even better.  It's a cute story for the young reader.

These are full of flavor - the Parmesan and Garlic flavors are strong and leave a strong after-taste, don't eat these on a hot date night.  These pretzel chips are also very firm and crispy, excellent for dipping into hummus, makes a great alternative to regular chips.  I gave 4 stars because I thought they were a bit harder than I would prefer.

This is a gorgeous book that is applicable across many ages for the younger or older or in-the-middle journal-er.  I find it to be a great jumping off point for a new to-journaling person but also as a seasoned journal it shakes things up some bit and provides some new creative brainstorming.  There are also some gorgeous pictures in this beautiful hard cover journal.Many of the lists are very traditional (Favorite places, happiest moments in life, etc.) but they still inspire some creativity if you put some thought into it.  The only downside, if you write a lot like me, you can get limited, amount 2 pages per a list.

These are beautiful, extremely shiny and brilliant.  A wonderful gift for young girls, daughters, nieces, etc.  The sterling silver does not irritate my ears - meaning it is not plated but truly sterling (I am quite sensitive my ears tell within a few minutes if there is nickel or some other metal).I do not think these are small at all, they are perfectly sized especially for a teenager or child.

I am not really down with flinging Play Doh around the house but this is a really cute set and the Star Wars faces on the tubs are awesome (and double as play items).  We kept it's use limited to the kitchen because who wants Play Doh in the carpet.  It's for your older Play Don fanatic, the small mold-ables are not really easy for the pre-schooler/toddler set.

We love our Play Doh and Play Doh accessories in our house.  This gets messy like everything does with Play-Doh but it's fun for the little ones.  The truck wheel prints is pretty cool.  Here's a tip - For stuck on Play-Doh pieces just wait for them to harden then shake them out.4 Starts because these are tiny Play-Doh containers and that wans't clear to me - thought they would be full-size!

Remember Mia is a engaging psychological thriller.  The story will keep you hooked through until the end. it's hard to put down. My feelings for the narrating character, Estelle, changed over the course of the novel which was interesting but fits in with the story line. It's almost as you are watching with her - her story unravel, like a spectator, so you have the same feelings as a judgmental outsider as does Estelle her self.  What keeps this from being a Gone Girl is the lack of character development for all of the other characters.  It's still a great, quick read and very entertaining.

This is a really cute toy at a great price point, it will be entertaining for young kids, 1-2, most 3 year olds will prefer a real outdoor scooter.  I like the smart stages products by Fisher Price, so you can change it up just when your kid gets bored or ready for the next challenging interaction.  This is pretty sturdy but can tip over.  It's close to the ground, though, so a tip over is not a big deal.

This has been great on my child's eczema.  It's not too heavy and blends in quickly rather than sit on top of the skin.  It also doesn't irritate his sensitive skin.  I do find the packaging cumbersome and annoying to open.  It looks great on a shelf but isn't the best functional design.  I believe tubes are best when gearing creams towards children, so much easier to use with one hand!

Very cute early chapter book with enough fun to keep the young reader engaged.  The story line involves twin sisters but I find that the plot of magic and spiders make the book appealing to both genders.  I think an age range of 6-8 is very appropriate.

When I opened the box I was surprised at the smaller size of this bottle compared to other cleansing oils I use (DHC is a favorite).  I proceeded to pump multiple times just as I would my other cleansing oils - don't do this!!! You only need a little, one pump will go a long way.  I love how this oil is light which feels nice for my more sensitive skin. I can't use other cleansing oils every day or I break out but I feel like I can use this Neutrogena Ultra-Light every day - I am going to try, for 3 days it has been great so far.4 Stars, because I don't think the fragrance needs to be there.  It is really a quite pleasant smell but I have very sensitive skin and tend to avoid fragrances and additives.

10 minutes is everything with young kids.  Sometimes you need to throw the pasta on pronto, toss in the sauce - and get that meal on the table!  I love that you don't have to wait for the water to boil with Pronto or drain it.  This made making dinner in a flash SOOOOO easy.  I will be buying more for those quick nights.  I love whole wheat pasta in their diet so alternating with that as well.  The taste was just like traditional pasta cooking methods, texture firm - "al dente" as they say.

Medium fits perfectly for my frame, 5'7" (140lbs-150lbs).  It's not as tight as I prefer in the middle, I would say light to medium support but it does smooth out lumps for a sleek silhouette.  I love the material very soft and smooth against skin and under clothes.

I am obsessed with coconut oil . Vita Coco offers a high quality product at a great price point from a brand you can trust if you are familiar with their coconut water (also great).  So MANY uses, just google coconutoil. My favorites are oil pulling, moisturizing and in my coffee!

This book was an ok read.  I was really interested in the savant and autism aspect of Clay Marzo's life and while it is touched upon there is a lot of surfing in this book (I know, what did I expect!?!)  I don't surf or really know much about it so I couldn't relate to many areas and nor am I interested in learning about surfing.  I do think the book is well written and will be of interest to many adult and young adults and surfing fans.
Good reading, different story line, making for good reading. Some of the subject matter is a bit disturbing knowing that it actually happens in real life.
This case is durable, colorful and looks great on the phone. Oh, and it also fits the S4 perfectly.

When I first saw this camera and its relatively inexpensive price, I thought to myself that this was probably a bit on the cheap side and very well not worth the price. But because of Amazon's wonderful return policy, I thought I would buy it for one of my three retail business locations. I'd set it up, try it for a week and see how it went. Well, setup was as easy as everyone has said it would be. The quality of the picture is shocking. If you want to read the fine print, set it for HD and you really do get HD. And Pan and Tilt is not 100% smooth, but, hey, this beauty is less than $100. I wouldn't even have expected Pan and Zoom at that price range. I can monitor the camera on my Android phone and on my iMac computer. Settings are extensive and it is very flexible. In addition, with the addition of a 32gb MicroSD Card, I can have the camera save the video. At my current resolution (you have 4 choices of resolution), the FujiKam tech told me that I should get at least 48 hours of recording. So, should something bad happen, like a break-in, I can save the recording and give to the police.The real test in a product like this has as much to do with customer service. I have called twice, and the customer service is spot on. On the second call, they were not opened yet, and I went thru to the answering service. Wasn't sure I'd hear from anyone, yet 2 hours later, they called and answered all my questions.The only thing that needs improvement is the manual, and on my call today, the tech informed me that a new manual was coming out soon and asked me to email him at support@fujikam.us and request to have a new manual emailed to me upon release. Again, they responded quickly, letting me know that I was on the list.I mentioned that I had three retail stores. In my first store, I had a professional system installed, and I haven't had phone access to it in over a year... what a waste of several thousand dollars. In my second store, I installed a Lorex system, and sometimes I can access it, sometimes I can't. It's hit or miss. So today, I ordered two more units and two more 32gb MicroSD Cards. So now, as long as the internet is up, I have access.Bottom line is that this is a wonderful video monitoring camera. Don't let the price fool you.

The Galaxy Gear S Charger is inexpensive for a reason. Unlike the charger that comes with the watch, this unit does NOT have a battery backup on the charging dock, and is strictly a dock for charging. I was not aware of that until I tried to charge my watch without having it pluggged in.

As a small business owner, I have been using Torchstar MR-16 LED Bulbs for about two and a half years. When one of the two PAR20 bulbs burned out at home, I thought, what a good chance to check out the Torchstar PAR20 LED bulb. What a wonderful difference. It is fully dimmable, is only 8 watts vs the 50 watt bulb I previously had, and is rated to last 22.8 years. Even if it only lasts half that long, the payback on it in terms of lower electrical costs will be enormous.The bulb, ordered here on Amazon (where else would I order it!!), arrived on time. I was a bit surprised at the packaging, as the bulb was in its selling box in a small padded envelope. But it arrived safely, so no complaints.As you can see from the pictures, the light is much brighter and a bit more focused. But all in all, it puts out a beautiful light and I am extremely happy with it. I will keep the light on for several days and if I have any change of heart, I will update. Otherwise, suffice it to say that the Torchstar PAR20 Dimmable LED is a great buy.

Really nice little light. The auto on works well. I would have given it 5 stars, but I was a bit disappointed in the brightness of the light. The prism cover over the LEDs is a bit cloudy for my liking, and it filters out too much light. It is were clear, it would be a 5 star product.

Coralvue BioSphere Bio Pellets are working really well in my Coralvue Bio Pellet Reactor. Appear to be much better as controlling water quality than previous brands I have tried. I suspect that they would be just as effective in any other reactor. I have tried 5 brands total, and this seems to be the best.

This deshedding tool looks exactly like a FURminator, but trust me, it doesn't perform like a FURminator. Personally, the next time, I will spend the extra money and buy the real thing. Don't waste your money on this deshedding tool.

First, let me say that the bowl does what it is supposed to do. It slowed down the dog devouring her food.Now on the what was disappointing to me:1. The site says that the color might vary. No kidding. Mine was an ugly white. So unhappy, but not worth sending back and reordering, who knows what color I'd get next.2. Rubbery base is a bit of a stretch. Our bowl is on a tile floor, and by the time the dog was done, it was 10 feet away from where it started. I bought some rubber feet at Hobby Lobby and now at least it doesn't slide around.Great price, but not sure it was worth it.
These Bully Sticks are great. Fresh, and LOVED by the dog. Come well packaged. Not sure about the Free Range part, but the price was right.
Nice selection, but certainly not as many in the package as I expected. And smaller than I expected.

This is a replacement for a Zagg product that was HUGE and heavy. And that was a replacement for another Zagg cover that was poorly designed. I wanted a slim case that fit well and had side buttons that provided positive feel. This case does all of that. I would have given it 5 stars, but as some other reviewers have mentioned, the plastic case, although dimpled like the S5, is very slick. When I pick up the phone, I feel like it is going to slip out my hand. Probably never will, but that's the feeling I get. The headphone opening has been widened in order to accept just about any headphone jack you want to throw at it. The charging port is also large and easy to access. And as I mentioned in the beginning, I wanted buttons that had a distinctly positive feel. This case succeeds in doing that. In fact, it succeeds in all aspects. Just wish it had a bit more of a rubbery feel to it so I'm not worried about dropping it. So, if I could give it 4.5 stars.

I use mine on a 2002 Lexus SC430 and love it... well until it tells me that I've been driving too fast and braking too hard. Sometimes the truth just hurts. I had no problems setting this up on my Android Galaxy GS5, and it syncs each and every time that I start my car. I haven't had to test the "check engine" light function on it yet, thank goodness, but since it plugs into the same dongle that the Lexus dealer used to diagnose my car, I suspect that it will work as advertised. If you are trying to become more conservative in your driving, or want instant notification of any issues in your car, this device is a bargain.It will also tell you where you last parked your car. I wish that it was able to zoom in better to the car location. I tried to use it in a large parking lot, and it wasn't all helpful.

Who would have known what effect this silly little toy could have on a cat. Or in our case, 4 cats. One of our feline friends is a Savannah Cat named Koti. Very loving, but not overly playful. UNTIL the Cat Dancer 301 showed up. Koti will seek this thing out, pick it up in his mouth and walk around the house with a meow/growling. Or he will let me take the handle and follow me around the house with the thing in his mouth again. The fabric is colorful, soft and stretchy. The other three cats enjoy it, but then again, they are more normal cats and chase after everything.

I found this faucet to be better than I expected. The quality of finish is superb, the installation was far easier than it appeared on the site. The movement of the water flow control arm was smooth. The water flow was delightful. The water flow part of this unit extended out a bit more than I was expecting. But all in all, this is a wonderfully made and designed waterfall faucet.
Well built, solid. Very happy with this purchase.

NOT made to use with the new GS5. The support on the bottom does not allow for the plugging in of the charging cable. Neither the dual or single sized cable. In addition, the silicone suction cup is not overly supple, and does not conform to the surface that you are trying to attach to. Will be returning. It will certainly fit many different sizes, but as I said earlier, you can't charge while using this unit.
A Hayward original filter. I thought I was getting a generic model. Imagine my surprise when I opened the box and found an original.

Several folks have commented about possibly needing a repeater for cars older than 2012 in order to use the HomeLink buttons on your car. And one person mentioned that it was only a $7 shipping fee. I just called Chamberlain today about my cars not working, and that is correct.... a $7 shipping fee, plus $27 for the repeater.  They make a good product, but if you are wanting to use the HomeLInk on your car, and it is older than 2012, you should call Chamberlain ahead of time and verify whether or not you will need a repeater. The number is: 1-800-528-5880. Otherwise, the unit is quiet, well designed and easy peasy to put up.

I have problem with LG Tone HBS-750 Bluetooth headset. There is no problem pairing or connecting. The problem is; when talking on Samsung Galaxy S5 via LG Tone Bluetooth headset at some random point in the conversation the microphone stops, but the earbuds are still working. I can hear, but I can't be heard. I can take the phone off headset selection, and then put it back on headset selection, and that makes it work, again, for a short while, then it happens, again. I lost the mic 5x in a 30 minute conversation. It is an intermittent problem. A Verizon tech did a factory reset on my phone when I took the first one back. I have also done a soft reset, and LG tech had me do a reboot on the headset. The problem persists. I have been in touch with LG and Verizon. The general consensus is there is a glitch in the headset software, but LG says it is not their problem. If it were not for this problem I would be absolutely thrilled with the LG Tone HBS-750 Blue tooth headset.Further research on Google shows that I am not the only one having this issue. But there also seems to be a solution, albeit not a great solution, but one none the less. This issue of the mic going to mute can be stopped by turning off the wifi on the phone. Unfortunately, I use wifi at home, and this is be a huge inconvenience, but it works. One solution that seems to work is to turn off WIFI when using the phone. It is a real inconvenience, but if  you want to continue this headset like me,  you start remembering to turn wifi off.The most frustrating part of this is that I have contacted LG both via phone and chat, and both times they claim complete ignorance of the problem. I have even directed them to the forums where the issue is being debated/complained about. They, LG, simply do the ostrich dance, sticking their heads in the sand and saying it doesn't exist. A couple of customers actually put comments on the LG forum and LG took them down stating "your review did not meet our guidelines for posting on our site." I guess that means that LG only accepts positive reviews.Don't get me wrong, this is a wonderful headset. The best I have ever owned. WHEN IT WORKS!!! But it is very frustrating to be talking on the phone and have your mic go mute all of a sudden. Or having to turn off wifi so that you can talk without being cut off.If you do buy the LG TONE HBS750, just be aware of the issue and the fact that LG is not going to acknowledge that there is an issue.

I needed to upgrade my USB hub as I was now using some 3.0 devices. I have purchased from Anker in the past and found three attributes about them that I highly value.1. They have incredible customer service,2. They provide a quality product3. They provide a competitive price pointAnd with the Anker AH121 USB 3.0 7-Port hub with power supply, they did not disappoint. It is well made, looks great, and fits my needs. I highly recommend not only this product but that you consider Anker for any other product that  you need that they provide.

This is a nice unit, but not as nice as I was hoping that it would be. I use four of them for moving a glass kiln in the garage, and leveling it prior to firing. I thought it would be as easy on turning the red gear knob. That works until you get the feet grounded and have to start lifting weight. Then you have to resort to the included wrench. Also, I expected the feet to be a nice hard rubber type. Instead, they are soft, thus much of the leveling is to simply overcome the give in the rubber. Although they are advertised to support a total of 1320 pounds, I have found that to be a bit of a stretch. My kiln is only a couple hundred pounds and it is a chore trying to level them.
This unit is nice and large, easy to use and well worth the cost. Previous ones were much smaller in diameter, so I was very pleased to see the larger size.

Two things that caught my attention with this cable. First, it is much thicker than the Samsung OEM cable that I have. I chose to have a couple of extra, one for the office and one for the car. But this unit is thicker and thus not as flexible.Secondly, the fit is overly snug. Whereas the OEM version plugs/unplugs with ease, the two CITI units are more difficult to plug in. As if they are just a hair larger than the OEM product.Now, that all being said, they work fine. No issues with the construction or data thru put.

Needed to replace the OEM battery after a short period of time. This battery works well, seems to last longer and was a whole lot less expensive. This is my second Anker battery, and I am starting to become an Anker fan!

After having a PC Laptop for a couple of years to run my Quickbooks (I have to use the PC version for IT purposes), and having that same PC die on me a few times, I finally took the plunge and bought Parallels. I only need it to run Quickbooks. Since I installed on my iMac, I have had ZERO issues. It works flawlessly, each and every time. I wish I had started off with Parallels and never bought the PC.

As with any QB product upgrade, it has a lot of new features and benefits. But as with any upgrade, it has some areas that are flawed and some that were changed that probably shouldn't have been. But, overall, it is a positive upgrade.

Imagine my surprise when I received my container of test strips for Hydrogen Peroxide and there was not color chart to compare with. It wasn't until I read the entire site VERY carefully that I noticed that these strips are only good when used in conjunction with 525nm eXact Photometers. In order words, they are worthless alone. Don't waste  your money on these if you are looking to do a dip test and compare the strip results with a color card, etc. You need a $300+ metering system.

I run a small business with three locations, and we go through a fair amount of laser toner. And LIINKYO, purchased from Amazon is my toner of choice. I have been using Linkyo cartridges for over two years, and I am 100% satisfied.

This is a replacement light for an older halogen desk lamp. What an incredible difference. The light is sharp, crisp and, of course, adjustable. I like the different modes of lighting, although I use it primarily in its brightest settings. It is well made, has a nice arc of movement, and so far, works great. I would highly recommend this light to anyone looking for a modern looking LED Desk Light.
Works well, but sometimes the buttons are not completely responsive and you have to push in harder than you would have expected to. Otherwise, a very nice product.

Typical Gideon Box character novel by John Locke. Fun to read, a few good twists, and great links to characters in his other series of novels. John is an easy and fun read, it is obvious that he enjoys writing. This book is not heavy in its content, but is an enjoyable light read. Don't expect more. But if you want to be completely entertained, you will love reading John Locke novels.

When my refractometer broke, I looked at replacing it. Then I saw that the Milwaukee Digital was just a few dollars more. And so worth the price. I have run tests, doing the same water numerous times and got the same reading. I use mine to test my reef water and the salt water I am mixing for my two tanks. I was a bit surprised at the huge size of the refractometer, not sure why it has to be so large, but for accuracy and simplicity, you can't go wrong.

I am a heavy user of my Galaxy S3, as it it used for personal and business phone calls, video, and constant use of Audible.com book listening. The original battery worked okay, but with the change to this new Anker battery, my time between charges has increased by several hours. I love the thinness of the GS3, and did not want to succumb to the bulkiness of an extended batter. This battery is a GREAT compromise. And at a great price. Highly recommended.

I was very leary of buying this product but did so anyway. Then I talked to a car buff buddy of mine, and he gave me some hints, but said to forge ahead. The instructions tell you to be careful to tape around your headlight covers. But what my friend told me was that the last step, the polishing compound is very hard on paint. Even if it just gets slung on the paint during the polishing phase. It was recommended to me to cover the car out 2 to 3 feet with paper so that the polishing compound doesn't come into contact with your car paint. So, off I went, doing all the steps. I agree with the instructions, a couple extra passes over the lens cover is worth the time and trouble. Now my 2002 Lexus SC430 headlights look like the day I bought the car. The whole process goes quickly, is easy to do, and there's usually enough left over to do it again in a couple of years. Highly recommend.

What can I say, I have read each and every John Locke book. He has a wonderful style, can keep you riveted, and with a fun sense of humor. You can't go wrong. And on the off chance that you don't like his style, he has priced his books right and you won't walk away with empty pockets. But, again, I thoroughly enjoyed the read, and think it is well worth your while.
What's better than an Amazon Gift Certificate? Nothing!! A wonderful way to help someone out that has a Kindle and likes to buy books.

Just like ink jet printers, the cost of toner is simply crazy. The printer only cost $200, but four cartridges will run you about $300. Nuts. I really like the printer, but I'm having second thoughts now that I need new toner

Well, once again, John Locke shows his diverse writing style. This book is light reading, sprinkled with one thing new from John, a really great sense of humor. I am proud to say that I have read everything by John Locke, and his writing just keeps getting better and better.

I use EverNote extensively, and thought that having this notebook would be a great addition. Well, for me, it isn't all that convenient. The notebook is well made, but so are other notebooks at a third the price! Unless you take lots of notes and need to have them scanned into EverNote, this notebook is not worth the expense.

I was so excited to get this ventilation system for our kitchen. It replaced one that simply recycled the air, whereas this one vents to the outside. Upon installation, only one of the two lights worked. I called customer service, which was a pleasant experience. He spent well over 45 minutes with me trouble shooting and finally decided to send me new lighting parts, as one of the switches was faulty. Everything worked great for about three months. Then the fan started to get really noisy when turned on high. Almost as if it were out of balance. I cleaned the blades best I could but to no improvement. Then, the light bulbs melted the plastic cover when they dropped down a bit and ended up touching the plastic. $25 later, I insert a new plastic cover. I made some modifications to the light assembly to hold it up out of the way of the plastic cover, but the heat of the light bulbs is still making it crack. Now, the right light comes on only when it feels like coming on. I have checked all the wiring, and have strong connections. I made sure that the bulb was screwed in tightly, and again, it was.I cannot in all honesty recommend this product. Ever. It looks great, works lousy. Buyer beware.

I bought one and it worked great for a little more than a week. Amazon was great about returning it, of course. Thinking that I just had a "lemon", I bought another one to replace the first one. Well, it lasted all of three (3) days, and now no longer works. My first inclination was to give it 5 stars, it does a great job picking up things, especially hair, and if you have a long hair dog, you'd love this thing. BUT, they just don't last.

After looking at several sites for buying this Dyson Battery Pack for the DC16, I settled on the OPK Company. They shipped in a timely fashion, but due to pathetic US Post Office abilities, the packaging was damaged and it didn't appear that it was going to show up. I contacted the company and immediately received a response that they would investigate and ensure that I was made whole. Later that day, the package arrived, wrapped in Post Office plastic with a "Gee we're sorry we destroyed the shipping envelope and this is so late" letter. But, it arrived, and the battery itself was not damaged. It had a nearly full charge on it, but I immediately hooked it up to the charger. It works great, and will hopefully work well into the future.
Not much you can say about this... it is a sign sticker. Well made, the printing is of good quality, and the material is strong and should last.

I wouldn't rank this case up at the top of the high quality cases, but, on the other hand, it's not "that bad". The fit is good, has never fallen off, but is a bit on the bulky side. If you are looking for an Auburn iPhone case, I would recommend.

I like this iOttie One-Touch Windshield Car Mount so much that I purchased another one. I have the first one in my car and it works wonderfully. Living in Florida, the interior can get very warm and other units that I have owned would drop off the windshield after a while. Not the iOttie. I have a Galaxy GS3, and it holds the phone in place, minimal movement from car vibration, and with the push button clamping system, it is unbelievably easy to put on and take off. Oh, and the second one??? I use it on my nightstand to hold the phone, as I use Gentle Alarm by Motibitobi as my alarm clock, and the iOttie holds it in place. I highly recommend this product.

Great book, lots of good reading. I have enjoyed his books for the past 15 years, and will continue to purchase. My wife complains that I spend too much time in the bathroom, and I have Uncle John to blame for that!!!

Other reviewers mentioned that the light was yellow in color, but I didn't realize how yellow until I put this out with some other LED landscaping lights that we have. And then it became very apparent that they are very yellow. Just be prepared for that. If they are all you use and don't mix with other LED lights, you will be fine. Otherwise, it will look a bit odd.

I change mine every three months whether they need it or not. They are well made and hold up the entire time they are being used. They have made a huge difference in the amount of particles that would get into our water lines from the well pump. Actually, they have reduced the particles to zero!!  Not much else to say about them.

I was introduced to Lee Child and Jack Reacher via a sale on Amazon. I am now hooked on the Jack Reacher series and will begin reading them, one by one. Starting now with the second in his series. In this case, "giving" the book away for $1.99 will make Amazon plenty from me, as I will now have to buy the remaining 30+ books at full retail. Nice job, Amazon, great marketing. As to the book itself, it started off a bit slow, as the author spent well needed time to introduce his character to us. I enjoyed all the twists and turns that the book took on its way to the end. Lee Child was able to throw in suspense, romance, detective work, and good old fashion action, making this a very good book to read.

On replacing my mower battery for the second time, the employee at the auto parts store said lead acid batteries would last much longer if I would install this Battery Tender, so I bought one. I don't know if it extends battery life as it has been installed less than a year. However, it is nice to hear the engine spin so well after several months of the mower sitting unused.As I have a car that is seldom used, I decided to order a second Battery Tender Junior. The Tender has adequate power to bring to bring this larger battery back to full charge after the car is driven, it just takes longer than with the mower battery. Don't know if it has enough capacity to bring the car battery to full charge if it is really discharged?I will update this review after I've had enough experience with the Battery Tender Junior to determine if it really extends battery life. Already they are worth the investment just to have the batteries always at full charge.

We retired our 2" memory foam pad after 6 years and installed this 3" one. It's hard to remember how the 2" foam pad originally felt to judge just how much it may have changed, but this 3" made a immediate improvement in comfort for both my wife and myself. Neither of us have had joint pain since we installed it over a month ago.To install this pad I stripped the bed and opened the package on the bed. I preserved the plastic sheet and the plastic bag  the pad came in, just in case i needed to reuse them. I allowed the pad to expand on the bed so that I did not have to lift it. It fit the queen bed exactly right out of the package, not much expansion was required. It had a slight odor similar to some household cleaning products, not too objectionable. The odor disappeared after the pad sat all day on the unmade bed.  We made the bed that evening have enjoyed the additional comfort ever since.

It was good to find another vitamin pill that contained only the essentials. I was afraid that when One-A-Day quit manufacturing their "Essential" we were out of luck finding a vitamin without all of the junk we really didn't want or need. It's a little larger than the original, but it is well shaped and easy to swallow. The price is reasonable.

It works, but it leaks unless you really tighten it, at least that is the way it works with my hose.  I previously bought a plastic one and was unable to stop it leaking so I bit the bullet and ordered this one, although I felt it was too expensive. The brass construction with the steel clamp makes the difference. It is possible to tighten the clamp quite tight without damage to the brass sleeve.

We are quite happy with this mattress cover.  Presently it is installed over a 3" memory foam pad (and a 12" mattress).For us, this mattress cover reduces joint pain from sleeping on either side or on our backs compared with the memory foam alone. It works well.  The multiple squares are filled with polyester and are quite soft. The squares are heavily stitched to to keep the padding in place and the skirt is large enough to keep the entire pad in place on the bed.

This is a bare bones, basic phone except for a memory of 3 emergency and 9 personal phone numbers. There is no display, no unanswered call lists,  no caller ID, etc. I bought three of these Trimline Corded phones to replace phones that had these features.  I did this because the previous phones ate batteries, but mainly because conversations were not as clear as conversations on these phones are, These may be basic phones without features but they are very good at what phones are supposed to be good at, clarity and low noise, and the price is quite reasonable.There is a small device in the carriage of this phone that can be rotated to provide a hook to retain the hand piece when the carriage is wall mounted. It works much better at holding the phone securely when mounted on the wall than the compromise design of the carriage my previous phones had that sort of holds the phone when wall mounted yet still doesn't fit well when not wall mounted  One of my Trimline phones is wall mounted and two of them are not. All three hang up easily and securely.

I like David McCullough's books,  they are generally easy to read, they flow nicely and they tell an interesting story. This one is no exception. It concentrates on the social rather than the technical aspects in the development of the first heavier than air flying machine. It delves deeply into the relationships of the two brothers, Orville and Wilbur,  their sister and the father of the Wright family, Other immediate members of the family are barely mentioned.As many books have been written about the Wright brothers, Mr McCullough perhaps wanted to tell the lesser known aspects of the story. His love of France, Paris in particular is well covered as Wilbur spent a lot of time, did a lot of flying there and was well received by the people.Personally, it has been some time since I read in depth about the first flights and would have preferred more technical detail. For example, what did they learn with the wind tunnel that they designed and built? Evidently, it was crucial to the airplane's development but there is no information given.  The aerodynamic data that was accepted at the time is stated to have been incorrect. How the brothers corrected the data and what they concluded is not specified. Very little about the design of the kites they first flew or the man carrying, self propelled machine they developed and continued to refine is  described.

Where applicable, this may be the strongest glue available. It is certainly very strong and versatile. I have used it for everything from model airplanes to a cast iron candle holder. However, it must be clamped while it sets, as it expands while setting. It does not not harden in the bottle so any amount not used can be used at a later time. The glue is water activated, one side of two pieces to be attached should be moistened. When set the joint is waterproof.

This is a very nice and quite durable dog leash. This is actually our second order of this leash. The first one lasted several years and we walked our dogs with it seven days a week. Eventually the internal spring broke, but not until our dogs had pulled on it and run with it many, many times. The new one seems exactly like our previous one, very high quality workmanship and materials. (It was made in Germany not in China as so many similar ones are.) Our dogs love the retractable feature. It gives them some freedom, but they remain under control.

This is a nice looking squirrel guard. It does not prevent squirrels from eating the bird food, but it does slow them down a bit! The rated load is barely sufficient to support my loaded (12 pounds of bird food) feeder, but so far (nearly six months), it has held up well. Even so, the plastic hook does appear a bit fragile.

Good Pads, they are sized well and the adhesive backing is sufficient to hold them in place in most applications. For chairs that are frequently moved on hard surface floors, a little Gorilla glue added, helps keep them attached to the chair legs.

I bought this gel to help the chest strap of my HRM (Heart Rate Monitor) to work better, to start working quicker and to produce a more accurate result. It works, but really no better or faster than water, and it is messier than water. It leaves a residue that needs to be removed. Water is still the best solution for me.

These brushes look and brush the teeth just like the original ones. However, they vary considerably in the way they fit the handle. Some fit pretty well, others are quite loose or quite tight. Those that are too loose result in a annoying buzz while cleaning the teeth. The ones that are too tight are difficult to install and remove. This may be the reason the price is so reasonable, quality control was not what it should have been.In spite of this, they all will install on the handle and they do clean the teeth. I will put up with the frustration of an incorrect fit for the low price!

Products with the Dove name are usually pretty good. Their deodorant container is especially nice. It is large enough to hold sufficient product to last quite awhile. The base rotates to raise the product just the right amount as it is used.  It does nor cause me to break out with an underarm rash as many of the anti-antiperspirants do, and the deodorant effect lasts for a reasonable time.  However, some of their deodorants have, to me, a quite offensive smell.  This "Cool Silver" version works for me,

It's pretty obvious that with all of the plastic parts, this weed remover can be broken with sufficient force. Many people complained about it breaking in their review of the product. That's why we waited until we had used it for awhile before writing a review. We wanted to see if it broke when reasonable force is used.After removing several types of weeds from hard clay Texas soil without breaking any of its parts, we are convinced it is reasonably durable. Sometimes when the soil is particularly dry or hard it is necessary to work the handle back and forth to loosen the soil a bit before pulling back against the foot (see diagram).  Even with this extra bit of work it is still easier to remove weeds from our Zeon Zoysia lawn than any other weed remover that we have tried.

This is a beautiful and elegant glass. The design is unusually nice especially the stem and base. The lip is thin yet comfortable. The finish is outstanding.They are not inexpensive but reasonable especially considering the crystal content. They are suitable for any setting. The size and shape are suitable for any varietal red wine, not just Pinot Noir.

From what I know of him, I like Henry Paulson. He has a laid back demeanor, seems a willing listener and is not overbearing in any way. However. as an author, I'm not so sure. His fascination with China is a bit puzzling, and the book is a bit boring.The book is primarily about Mr. Paulson's experiences with high ranking individuals in China and is divided more or less into three sections. The first relates to business experiences while he was at Goldman Sachs. The second, his involvement in China's economic development while he was secretary of the U.S. Treasury and the third and longest section, that is continuing, is about his relationship with China's leaders as the head of the Paulson Institute. The third section in particular, reads as if he is writing to the responsible Chinese officials rather than the general reader, as if he is expecting they will read the book. He is selling his services as they convert from a manufacturing to a consuming economy. He also offers help in the economical improvement of their environment.His premise is that communist or not, it is better to help the Chinese rather than be antagonistic of even agnostic toward them.

I like this brand of Beta Alanine powder better than some of the other brands that I've tried. A dose of 1200 mg causes a slight tingling sensation as expected but no bad aftertaste. More importantly, it helps noticeably with long weight workouts.  My energy level lasts longer than without it.One brand was bad about forming lumps that were a bit hard break up to get an accurate dose.  The Now Foods brand does not seem to form lumps at all and the price is reasonable

Our Veterinarian recommended this dog food for our Miniature Schnauzer several years ago and we have been using it every since. (Yes, he also sells it.) Our dog eagerly eats it  he seems to really like it. He is quite energetic and his coat looks good.The Hills Science Grain Free dog food is more expensive than many other brands, but to see him eat so eagerly, look so good and to have so much energy makes it worth it.

I have mowed my one acre lawn for ten years now and have tried several different blades (with the same Craftsman lawn tractor). These blades are the best that I have used. They are heat treated so they do not bend easily if they hit a rock or other object and their edges stay sharp much longer than some. I was able to use my previous set of these blades for two full seasons. (I replace rather than resharpen.)The design works very well to mulch the grass. I have a lawn sweeper but seldom have to use it as the grass (Zeon Zoysia) discharge is pretty fine and does not require the use of the mower's mulching attachment.The price is reasonable, better than some that do not perform as well.

Maybe I got a membrane in June 2013 that was not up to standard but it never produced water from my R.O.  system with a TDS less than 50 ppm. I continued using it as it was rejecting 80% of dissolved solids, but I thought it should work better than that. This year, after only two years of service it would only produce water with a TDS of 110 ppm and  that is unacceptable. Membranes normally last 3-5 years.In spite of this experience I ordered another one and it is producing water of 18 ppm, excellent. Input water has been constant with dissolved solids  260-280  ppm for the past several years so this is a much better membrane than the past one. I hope it continues to work well for at least three years.

After reading all of the reviews for this Vacuum we concluded it must be somewhat delicate, easily broken. particularly the handle. But, as so many liked it's performance, we decided to buy it anyway.  It works very well to pick up dirt, dust, leaves, and other trash that accumulates on floors and throw rugs. It does not do well on dense carpet. It does not replace a regular, corded vacuum cleaner, but is really convenient for quick clean ups.We are very careful with it and after several months use, it has been trouble free and well worth the purchase price.

This is my second set of these replacement batteries.for my Braun Oral-B Sonic Complete toothbrush that I love.  The first set lasted two years. They work very well but I wish they would last longer. I was tempted to install NiMH batteries to replace these Ni-Cd batteries this time but was afraid the charger would not be adequate..

I am quite pleased with the job this unit did aerating my acre lawn, actually it worked much better than I expected. Assembly was a bit tedious, the instructions including the diagrams must be followed exactly. For instance, if he instructions say insert a screw and the diagram shows one screw, it means at that point insert only one screw even though eventually two screws will be installed at that location. If it says don't tighten then do not tighten, you will later. My wife helped with the assembly which made the job much easier!When aerating my front lawn, I used 4, 25 lb. weight-lifting weights. I got tired of moving the weights back and forth, so later when I aerated the back yard, I used large rocks. In each case, I held them in place with bungee cords which worked very well. The lift feature is really nice if you have to drive any distance and not aerate.I believe the secret of getting good results is in towing the aerator very slowly. It takes a while, but the results are worth it.

We prefer the texture of Paleo cookies with the unblanched Almond flour.  For Paleo muffins we cannot tell the difference in texture or flavor and it is less expensive than the blanched flour, so we have begun using this version at least for these items.

It's smaller than I expected and I wasn't sure the charger was the problem with my Braun Oral-B Sonic Complete toothbrush. I had changed the battery and the light on the toothbrush went from flashing to solid with the old charger indicating the battery was charged, but the toothbrush did not work properly. As a last chance effort  before disposing of the brush I loved,  I ordered this smaller than the original charger as it seemed to be the only compatible charger offered by AmazonIt works great. The lights on the brush work as always, but now it is really charged. I still do not understand why the charge lights on the brush worked as they did when the toothbrush was not really charged, but now it works like new.
Laces as expected, good color, correct length, appears to be of good  quality. Will know more after they have been worn awhile.

This three-piece measuring set is very well done. After using plastic ones for several years,  it is a real pleasure to use a measuring cup with very readable markings. I often avoided the 2 cup plastic one because the markings were so hard to read. The markings of all three sizes of these cups are very readable from inside or outside the cup,These cups are slightly larger than the required volume. As a result, I am often able to mix within the cup rather than having to pour the mixture into a larger vessel, a significant convenience.The handles are comfortable and useful with hot or cold liquids. The pour spouts work well with liquids or lumpy mixtures.

This is a well designed, compact weight rack. It takes surprisingly little space in my home workout room yet holds all of my weight plates {5,10 and 25#) and the bar. With everything in place including the bar, I have a bit over 200# on the rack and it is very stable.Assembly was simple, it does require a wrench to tighten the aircraft type nuts (self-contained locking insert), but a metric size hex wrench  for the bolts is included. Total assembly time, less than 15 minutes.I purchased this rack and several dumbbells (same manufacturer) from Walmart. Each item was less expensive than Amazon and I received them in two days with free shipping,  just like my Amazon Prime!

A beautiful puzzle, but very difficult. Unless you are a dedicated puzzler you may want to skip this one. The pieces are small as well as the picture on the box, not much to serve as a guide. The descriptions are in Latin and the geography, although interesting, is so different from what we now understand, it is not very useful to help solve the puzzle.Nevertheless,  the effort to complete it is well worth it if you have the time and patience..

This is not an exhaustive source by any means, but it does list significant events in chronological order with specified dates (at least by year). It is not a history, but it tells a lot about LBJ. Perhaps it will inspire reading one of the many good history books on the subject!

We ordered this 5# Honeyville almond meal flour and 5# Anthony's almond flour at the same time to determine which of the two produces better results in our Paleo recipes. We had heard that both were good products. We could not determine that one was better than the other. They had the same texture, flavor, color and density. Almond bread was excellent with either as were almond cookies, muffins, and several other recipes that contained almond flour.We hope this sample was typical of both products so that in the future we will order the one with the lowest cost (and expect good results)!

This is an attractive, well made addition to our pots and pans. The bottom section is non-stick inside and outside that works very well when *seasoned* as directed. The handles are well designed and comfortable. The top section is thin but not so much so as to be easily damaged. It has a beautiful finish that with hand washing I hope does not discolor with time and use,.

We have to wonder how they do it, build such an inexpensive processor that really works well! When we began looking at food processors we thought we would have to spend several times what this one costs for one that would stand up to our use. My wife and I started a Paleo diet and require a processor nearly every day. We ordered this one, fully expecting to replace in in a short time with a better unit but we couldn't resist the price.That was over six months ago and the processor still works like it did when it was new!
